name: Firefighter
description: A dynamic game with humor about the work of a firefighter.

name: Mil Rosas
description: Mil Rosas is an adventure game, autofictional, about someone playing a game in their console during chemo session.

name: Panic Mode
description: Panic Mode is a casual puzzle simulation game that puts the player in the position of a crisis manager who needs to save adorable aliens known as Pammies from disasters.

name: Fantasy Cards
description: Challenge 3 levels of AI in this Heroic Fantasy themed card game. Use the unique skills of your cards in fast-paced battles and deal big blows to your enemy with spells and magic to achieve victory. Whether you're a novice or an expert strategist, you'll quickly pick up the game and face its challenges. The incredible graphics and special effects will impress you!

name: Homebound
description: Homebound is a 2D platformer all about a journey home. Collect and use powers you find along the way to find your way home.

name: Escape: The Speedrun Game
description: The premise of the game is to escape the game level as quickly as possible. This is a great game for speed running!

name: More the Eternal Utopia
description: Visual novel that tells the story of Thomas More, who will travel to the present from Utopia Island.

name: Slime Story
description: Immerse yourself in the story and explore large, dangerous and exciting locations of new 3D platformer, filled up with many interesting and unusual mechanics that make this game unique. Go through the levels and try to beat the developer's best score!

name: BloodType
description: BloodType is a "Type'em Up," word-based, wave survival game. You must form words from randomly generated word scrambles to defeat your opponents. Test your vocabulary knowledge through 30 different stages all while under the pressure of advancing enemies.

name: The Absolutely Hilarious Cat Game
description: The Absolutely Hilarious Cat Game is exactly what you would expect it to be, the only thing is, things take a dark turn when you wake up in a place you shouldn't be... Wrong place wrong time I suppose... Watch out, Felines are on the prowl in Ginger's Peak. Get the job DONE, then GET OUT!

name: Turbo Tempest
description: A Multiplayer Speedboat Battle Arena where you fight to be the last boat standing using a range on weapons on the map.

name: Star Apprentice: Magical Murder Mystery
description: Star Apprentice: Magical Murder Mystery is a danmaku-detective game that combines point-and-click style deduction with high octane bullet hell gameplay. Find evidence, interrogate suspects, and refute contradictions to solve the case!

name: Connect Bricks
description: Connect bricks with matching colors and cover the entire board with bricks to solve each puzzle. But watch out, connections will break if they cross or overlap! Each puzzle has a grid of squares with colored bricks occupying some of the squares. The objective is to connect bricks of the same color by drawing connections between them such that the entire grid is occupied by bricks. However, connections may not intersect. Difficulty is determined by the size of the grid, ranging from 5x5 to 14x14 squares. Play through more than 2000 puzzless. Connect Bricks gameplay ranges from simple and relaxed, to challenging and frenetic. This puzzle game is a great mind practice.

name: Alone
description: An epic platformer where you must get through Painfully Hellish obstacles to reach the end in the fastest time possible! Avoid the Hazards, Traps, and obstacles in this precision platformer!

name: Genetic Fluff
description: Genetic Fluff is a Action RPG creature collection adventure game with local multiplayer support for up to 4 players. Genetic Fluff has auto-saved RPG stages, creatures, plots, experience, and quests, mixed with rogue-lite items and loot.

name: Nina Aquila: Legal Eagle, Season One
description:
The chart-topping indie hit Nina Aquila: Legal Eagle, Season One comes to Steam, with a slew of enhancements and new features! Step into court as Nina Aquila, rookie defense attorney in this thrilling VN/adventure game hybrid, and fight for justice in a world where all anime genres exist at once!

This game replaces the earlier episodic releases and is a collected version of Chapters 1-3 of the "Nina Aquila: Legal Eagle" series.

name: Infinity Valley
description: Race through different procedurally generated terrains with several different obstacles; compete with your friends for best time and most checkpoints while collecting coins in order to unlock new cars and levels.

name: Fancy the Frog
description: Be a hero Fancy the frog. finish levels and avoid dangerous enemies

name: Cyberflight
description: Cyberflight is a high-speed, cyberpunk flying-car game with detailed, living, procedurally generated levels, backed by an atmospheric and original 80's soundtrack

name: War Stained
description: The year is 2022, war has kicked off and taken over the world. Everywhere you look you see tales of horror and war crimes.

name: Twig & Flipper
description: Twig & Flipper is a 2D platformer With the ability to Run or Fly.

name: Monster Hunter Stories 2: Wings of Ruin - Deluxe Edition
description:
The Deluxe Edition of Monster Hunter Stories 2 Wings of Ruin contains a variety of additional content to enhance your experience with the game.

・ Ena's Outfit: Kuan Coat
・ Rider's Layered Armor: Razewing Armor Alpha ＆ Beta
・ Rider's Hairstyle: Spiky Nergal
・ Navirou's Outfits: Nergigante and Pukei-Pukei Costumes
・ Sticker Sets: Adventure Buddies 2 & 3

name: Color Breakers
description: Color Breakers is a chaotic 1-4 player local and online multiplayer co-op coloring game where players need to work together in each of the levels to complete as many paintings as possible.

name: StarPicker
description: Immersed in a fantastic universe, challenge your navigational skills on unknown territories.

name: The Silver Case 2425: Deluxe Edition
description:
The Silver Case 2425 Deluxe Edition includes:
- The Silver Case 2425 Game
- Official Soundtrack
- Soft Cover Artbook
- Collector's Box

name: Ys IX: Monstrum Nox - Pact Edition
description:
While imprisoned in Balduq, Adol is cursed and becomes a Monstrum. With his newfound powers, he must stop the Grimwald Nox from consuming the city.

Pact Edition details: the gift of extra items awaits you in the Ys ix: Monstrum nox pact Edition! Get a taste of the mysteries & battles ahead with the melodies of the macabre soundtrack Sampler, Monstrum memoirs mini art booklet, & reverse cover sheet

name: Rainy Night
description: Rainy night is a Survival Horror game with resource management, sparse ammo and puzzle solving.

name: Lona: Realm of Colors
description:
"Take the brush as Lona, a young girl on a journey to the deepest depths of herself. Beware though! For in the realm of colors the craving to explore can turn to a yearning to return in a blink of an eye.

Lona - Realm of Colors is an independent puzzle-adventure dwelling in the highly stylized and abstract past memories of Lona.

Who is Lona? How did she come to be here? Push fear aside and command the paintings as the original artist, shifting the world to reveal the answers. Discover Lona’s past. Escape the Realm of Colors. Return to reality."

name: Layton's Mystery Journey: Katrielle and the Millionaires' Conspiracy - Deluxe Edition Plus
description: An updated edition of Layton's Mystery Journey: Katrielle and the Millionaires' Conspiracy - Deluxe Edition only available in Japan. It adds the option to change to the voice actors featured in the anime.

name: Honkai Impact 3rd: Outworld Traveler
description:
Version 4.9 of Honkai Impact 3rd, marking the conclusion of the Remaining Flames arc, which includes:
• New Valkyrie: Prinzessin der Verurteilung! (Fischl)
• New Story Chapter XXV: Set Tomorrow Ablaze
• New Animated Short: Everlasting Flames
• New Featured Event: Outworld Quest (Genshin Impact Crossover)
• ...and more!

name: Champions of Avan
description:
The fate of Avan is yours to write.

From small acorns great oaks grow. In this idle miner game you start with a small and humble village, tucked away in a shadowy corner of the land of Rokmyer, and are tasked with building it up into a grand and prosperous city deserving of a place of pride on both the map of the land and in the pages of history books.

name: Twisted Reality
description:
Something is wrong here. Very very wrong. Nothing makes sense. Why does nothing make sense?
Twisted Reality is a Hexen map for Gzdoom (only) that takes place during Korax's occupation of Cronos. It contains a new weapon and a few modifications to some of the enemies.

name: Skyland
description:
A simple strategy game, where you build flying castles and fight other players. Runs on a Gameboy Advance. Instructions included within the game!

Supported peripherals:

* Gameboy Player (Gamecube) rumble support

* Link cable multiplayer

* SRAM or Flash storage

name: G-Mode Archives+: Danmaku Kentei Shiken - DaiOuJou-hen
description:
Dear Danmaku believers, it's time for a deadly trial. Prove your strength in front of your ever-growing opponent.

Cave's shooting games are all about danmaku.
But how good am I really? A work that answers that question has finally appeared.

This work, "Danmaku Kentai Shikan" is a shooting game that diagnoses your ability to respond to barrage by continuing to fight against opponents who become stronger each time you defeat them.

In this work, which is called ``DaiOuJou-hen'', the brutal bosses of ``DoDonPachi DaiOuJou'' will block your challenge.

In addition to the in-game class evaluation, this game also supports online rankings, so you can further hone your skills by competing with users from all over the world.

Those who are not afraid of death, aim for the top of the barrage.

name: Run!
description: Sin descripción

name: Friday Night Funkin': VS. Starlight Glimmer & Trixie
description: Boyfriend and Girlfriend found a portal to Equestria...

name: El Gancho
description: The Pogovon Empire has invaded Cocodu planet and captured the cocos! In their search for an unlimited source of power amongst species from across the galaxy, the Pogovons learned about the unlimited happiness of the cocos. Now they've devised evil plans to extract that happiness to power their deadly weapons. El Gancho is set in the same universe as Task Force Kampas, but this time there's no help around. Play as a coco that finds an experimental laser-hook and swing your way through cosmic platforming stages in retro pixel art style! Search for your friends and destroy those imperial super weapons! The faster you move, the longer your trail becomes, and your trail can be used to wipe out enemies! Every run is randomly generated and unique, giving you a world of reasons to keep coming back and pushing your skills further.

name: 3 Minute Walk
description: 3 Minute Walk is a COVID-19 anxiety simulator.

name: Slide in the Woods
description: Ride it, see where it takes you.

name: Dungeons & Dragons
description: Dungeons & Dragons is a fan-made beat 'em up based on the animated series of the same name.

name: Train Sim World 2: Cane Creek: Thompson - Potash Route
description: Journey through the American West's awe-inspiring, rugged, and remote desert scenery while tackling heavy tonnage and daunting grades with the Union Pacific Cane Creek Subdivision route for Train Sim World 2!

name: LouveSystems' TrackMasters
description: Create your own tracks - challenge your friends!TrackMasters is a multiplayer arcade racing game inspired by MicroMachines, packed with a full level editor to make your own tracks the way you want, and share them with your friends!

name: Skullgirls: 2nd Encore - Annie
description: Fiercer than she looks, bravest in the cosmos, she is ANNIE OF THE STARS! This DLC includes Annie, her new stage, 29 palettes, character tutorials/trials, and full Story Mode!

name: Alice's Jigsaw Time Travel 2
description: See Alice and her friends! Solve 100 unique patchwork mosaics!

name: Panzer Corps 2: Axis Operations - 1942
description: The Axis Operations 1942 DLC Campaign almost exclusively focuses on the fighting on the Eastern Front in this critical year of the Second World War, 1942.

name: Gamemory
description: Improve memory of kids under 5 years old with Augmented Reality. This game is for 2 people — one of the parents and little wunderkind. The adult opens every square and lets the kid remember it. After that, closes and asks the kid what kind of thing under the exact square. Well, in the end, open together to check.

name: Conqueror's Blade: Season VIII - Dynasty
description: Rise above the storm clouds of ceaseless war, and breathe in the innovation and opportunity of a wondrous land. Follow the rise of a dynasty, of its heroes and warriors, through years of chaos and war to a time of order and prosperity. Behold this golden age in Season VIII: Dynasty, a new era of Conqueror’s Blade.

name: 明教风云之九阴九阳
description: Sin descripción

name: Find A Way
description: Find a Way is a game with elements of survival and saspens. Take the life of the protagonist into your own hands. Matthew is a writer who finds himself in a world unknown to him.Your task is to survive,no matter what, and learn to resist fear in search of a way out of the nightmare that befell you.

name: Guardians: Royal Journey
description: 1000+ levels tower defense

name: Hentai Match 3
description: A match 3 game with cute anime girls for your pleasure! These naughty girls wait for you to play with them. Contains adult erotic content

name: Arcade Archives: Sea Fighter Poseidon
description: Sea Fighter Poseidon is an action shooting game released by TAITO in 1984. The player fights against enemy divers and enemy’s battleships to save his captured friends. If the player's water scooter runs out of fuel, it will explode, so be sure to defeat enemy divers with torpedoes and steal it from them.

name: Iselin Saga
description: Follow Iselin in an adventure through a magical land to find the truth about her parents and stop witch Aradia.

name: 梦回三国
description: Sin descripción

name: Woodcutter
description: Embark on a magical adventure through the land of Aaran and help Woodcutter retrieve his firstborn.

name: Metro Simulator
description: Attention - the train is now arriving at platform 1! You are the train operator and thousands of people rely on you every day on their way to work or home. Take this unique chance to experience Moscow's subway systems in a whole new way! You control the train just like in real life: Accelerate, brake, open doors, switch cameras, set car functions and many other tasks! Take on the role of a passenger and visit stations, trains and the depot. Will you rise to the challenge and take control deep under the metropolis? Your passengers trust in you, get them to their destination safely and on time!

name: Urban Fight
description: This is a fight centered action games, a variety of skills, props, free combination of moves, let you experience the cool fighting scene!

name: Night: Silent Killer
description: 《Night: Silent Killer》是一款第三人称动作游戏，玩家扮演由【主人】创造的机器人【Night】，在主人的仪式过程中选择保护主人、帮助独轮车势力，或解放自己。Night使用她的权限力量，挥舞着扳手。选择权在她自己手上。

name: Forest Run: Animal Adventure
description:
Help Ferdinand find his friends

Randy's gang has attacked Ferdinand's village and kidnapped his friends. Help Ferdinand defeat Randy's henchmen and free his friends.

In the many levels you have to use skill and thought to get Ferdinand to the level exit. You can expect puzzles, an interactive environment and lovable heroes.

A round lasts only a few seconds. So you can also help Ferdinand to find his friends in between.

Can you find the shortest way?

name: Aesir Online
description: MMORPG made in Argentina inspired on Argentum Online.

name: 女孩与七匹狼
description: This is a horror decryption game It depicts a girl searching the house for information to decrypt Scenes are small for a house and may be updated with multiple scenes for a clue to a scene The game is not saved and must be completed once

name: Forgotten Journey
description: Forgotten Journey is a puzzle oriented platformer, where the player will follow a linear path jumping, climbing and solving puzzles with the help of an AI companion that will follow her.

name: Star Vortex
description: Star Vortex is a casual game where you gather stars, avoid the asteroids and try to set a high score.

name: Infinite Golf 2
description: Are you ready for a new golf challenge? Infinite Golf is back! You can choose from 4 different game modes in 4 different environments. In Classic Mode you don't have to worry about losing or winning. Just enjoy the calm atmosphere! In Time Attack mode you have 30 seconds and 5 additional seconds for every completed level. In Arcade Mode you have 3 tries for each level. If you run out of tries your game is over. In Multiplayer mode you can compete against up to 3 other players in 81 different game mode combinations! With procedurally generated levels there is always one more level!

name: Crash Drive 3
description:
Experience ridiculous fun in this cross-platform multiplayer, free-roaming game! Drive monster trucks, tanks and more amazing vehicles across a huge open world. Level up, play events, earn cash, unlock new cars and discover secrets.... Crash Drive is back!

COMPETITIVE EVENTS
Destroy a gigantic beach ball, catch robbers as a cop or steal the king's crown, these are just a few examples of the 10 fun game events this game has to offer. Participate in these random competitive events, beat your opponents to earn the most cash and buy awesome new cars or customisations.

CRAZY CAR LEVELING
By using nitro boosts you increase the car’s nitro capacity, by driving at top speed you increase its top speed... catch the drift? ‘Maxing’ all stats for a car increases your player level allowing you to buy new cars or customisations. Collect over 50+ vehicles and customise your car with funky antennas, boosts and unique number plates with your in-game name on it. Reach the maximum player level to prestige and show who is the real Crash Drive 3 boss! Solid golden car anyone?

OPEN WORLD EXPLORATION
To the moon and back! Drive around freely and explore the boundless and varied open world at your leisure. Fly a rocket to the moon, storm the king’s castle in the forest, go to the saloon in the wild west canyons or experience ice drifting fun in the arctic snow. Done with icy cold? How about a relaxing ferry trip to the tropics? Each area is unique and filled with secret areas, collectibles…

name: Shakespeare? More like Thirstspeare, amirite?
description: A human dating sim about writing a furry dating sim.

name: Mira's Brush
description:
What's Mira's Brush Anywho?
Packed with over 60 levels!! Mira captures colour and shape!

Mira's Brush is a cute, colour-based puzzle platformer brimming with bizarre enemies, lateral thinking puzzles, platform action, and intriguing gameplay experiments.

name: Puzz LR
description: Become the Ultimate Puzzler! Battle against the clock or others and get the top score.

name: Farmers vs Zombies
description:
Your community was taken down by a heavy storm which caused an apocalypse and unleashed the living dead. Together with the other survivors, it is your task to rebuild and to allow that sustainable life can still be assured. Cultivate your farm and manage your restaurant to provide food and deal with all the zombies.

It’s a strange Time Management Game. The light-hearted style of a casual game collides with elements, which are usually only seen in horror genres. Discover the contrast, which takes both genres for a wild ride.

name: eBaseball Professional Yakyuu Spirits 2021: Grand Slam
description: The eBaseball Professional Yakyuu Spirits series features realistic graphics that faithfully reproduce the facial expressions, forms, and gestures of the players. In this game, players will have the ability to play as all baseball athletes from the start of 2021 and will receive free updates.

name: Fuuraiki 4
description:
In Fuuraiki 4, you can enjoy the scenery from every angle, captured with a 360-degree camera in Gifu Prefecture—the heart of Japan.

The series, which will celebrate its 20th anniversary in 2021, has gained popularity as an adventure game in which you travel by motorcycle across beautiful, real-life scenery—and occasionally meet girls along the way.

Discover the unseen side of Gifu on a new motorcycle touring adventure.

name: Nemezis: Mysterious Journey III
description: Nemezis: Mysterious Journey III is a puzzle adventure game in which two tourists - Bogard and Amia - find themselves engaged in a series of mysterious events. Solve intriguing puzzles and unfold a story which will keep you on the edge of your seat until the very end.

name: Monster Hunter Stories 2: Wings of Ruin
description: Monster Hunter Stories 2: Wings of Ruin offers both RPG and Monster Hunter fans a unique new experience with a rich storyline featuring charming characters, challenging quests and friendly encounters with familiar monsters from the Monster Hunter series. Assuming the role of a young Monster Rider who can use a Kinship Stone to form strong bonds with monsters, players can gain experience and improve their skills to form deeper connections with these wonderful creatures. When ready, players can embark on memorable adventures filled with dramatic events and heartwarming friendships as the epic tale unfolds.

name: Sam & Max: This Time It's Virtual
description: Sam is a dog in a suit. Max is his naked rabbity partner. Together, they’re the Freelance Police. Jump into the not-quite-right world of Sam & Max via the wonder science of virtual reality, and join the multimedia darlings in their never-ending quest to slap the stupid grin off the face of evil.

name: 3D Aim Trainer
description:
3D Aim Trainer is the best game to test and practice your FPS aim! It comes with a multitude of aim training levels designed by ex-Pros and Aim coaches to improve your aim in all of the most famous FPS and TPS games on the market.

The detailed aim analytics on 3D Aim trainer help you identify your weak spots and train to correct them while tracking your aim progress over time.

You can play 3D Aim Trainer online for free on your browser or download it for free on Steam.

name: Totally Baseball
description: The full sport of Baseball in Virtual Reality!

name: Boomerang X
description: Armed with a magical boomerang, slice, fly, and dive through flocks of evil creatures in this acrobatic arena shooter. Obliterate wave after wave and journey ever downwards into the shadows.

name: Levi Chronicles
description: Leviticus Colman and his Crew have gone missing… are you and your Crew able to find out what Happened to Levi?

name: Eastern Exorcist
description: The Eastern Exorcist is a stunning 2D side-scrolling action RPG set in a fictitious oriental world with the infestation of vicious demon monsters. Play as a skilled exorcist against chaotic evil to fight your way through the brutal world, and experience unforeseen entanglements of complex beings.

name: Airtight City 2.0
description: This is a third person perspective, a horror type of action shooting game. The game will be rendered with a meticulous atmosphere and a strange story, attracting players into a dark world of incomparable horror. Here, you are not unarmed, but even with a gun, you can't suppress the trembling from the heart.

name: A.D. 2047
description:
The sudden car accident involved you, a detective, into serial killings.

With the in-depth investigation, you will find that the colorful city intertwined with the strength of the parties’ complot.

Only rely on your own hand to find the murderer, you can prevent the repeated fatal murder......

name: Sniper Elite VR
description: Grab your rifle, gaze down the scope and take aim in this stealth-action WW2 first-person shooter built exclusively for VR. With an explosive campaign, astonishing immersion, authentic weaponry, and signature gunplay from the award-winning Sniper Elite series

name: Combots
description: Combots is a multiplayer Free-to-Play shooter about robot battles on a fully dynamically generated map.

name: Fallout 76: Season 5 - Escape from the 42nd Century
description: Escape from the 42nd Century was the fifth season in Fallout 76. It began on July 7, 2021, with the release of the Steel Reign update. It follows Armor Ace and the Power Patrol in Cold Steel and was followed by The Unstoppables! vs The Diabolicals.

name: Zombie Frontier 4
description: Zombie Frontier 4 is the latest established sequel of the Zombie Frontier series. It is a first-person zombie shooting and action battle game. An easy control interface that brings you into an amazing sniper FPS shooting and killing game. Experience the feeling of a real apocalypse, kill zombies with legendary 3D weapons and watch those undead limbs explode. Join and fight against the zombie apocalypse!

name: Slow Mole
description: Slow Mole is a minimalistic platformer. Your goal is to reach the end. You are a mole, you are slow, and you can jump!

name: Meatsauce Madness: The Game
description: Control wrestling legend Soul Train Jones as he dashes forward to collect the dollars, breadsticks, and meatsauce he so rightfully deserves. Pull off stylish jumps, midair spins, and defeat enemies while propelling wall to wall while you gather meatballs

name: Outbreak Co-Op Anthology
description: Experience four co-op retro-inspired survival horror nightmares.

name: VR Pigeons
description: Use the power of VR and absolutely unique movement controls to slip into your pigeon-self! Bob your head back and forth to move around and eat all the bread. All the world’s a rooftop, and all the men and women merely pigeons.

name: 1001 Jigsaw: Earth Chronicles 5
description: 1001 photos of our fantastic planet! Discover the breathtaking beauty of our world alongside 1001 Jigsaw: Earth Chronicles 5!

name: X-Plane 11: Airfield Canada - CYHZ: Halifax Stanfield International Airport
description: Halifax Stanfield International Airport (IATA: YHZ, ICAO: CYHZ) is one of the busiest airports in Canada.

name: Slendergus
description:
Run and hide from Impostor amogus in the haunted skeld map! Survive and collect 8 pages to win the game!

Play in singleplayer or in multiplayer with your friends!

name: The Crew 2: Special Edition
description: Take on the American motorsports scene as you explore the USA in one of the most exhilarating open worlds ever created. With a wide variety of vehicles to choose from, experience the thrill and excitement of competing across the USA as you test your skills in a wide range of disciplines. The Special Edition features the Digital Special Pack which includes: Dodge Challenger SRT Demon Interception Unit & Porsche 911 Speedster

name: Tiger Tank 59 I: Break the Fog MP094
description: Tiger Tank 59 Ⅰ: Break The Fog is a top-down shooting game. Players need to control their tanks, through the enemy lines, break the enemy base, or defeat the enemy tanks. This DLC includes map pack 094.

name: Lisa: The Timeless
description: Lisa: The Timeless is a fan game based on the world established by Austin Jorgensen’s title, Lisa: The Painful, as a story set outside of the main plot of the original Lisa trilogy.

name: The Bad, The Worse & Djanky
description: A local and controller only western versus game featuring ricochets and 'realistic' weapon reloading.

name: Cat of Monte Cristo
description: A short RPG that is a parody based on the Count of Monte Cristo, with many liberties taken that make it not very close to the original story.

name: Black Hair Girl is Best Girl
description: This visual novel is a 2-in-1 combo featuring two stories where both heroines have black hair.

name: Castles & Catapults
description: Re-live this classic medieval strategy game, Castles & Catapults, which combines the turn-based planning and strategy of a board game with the action and excitement of a real-time strategy game.

name: John Christian
description: The John Christian Game is a story of heroism of a young man, who after receiving the armor of God, goes in search of imprisoned lives. On his journey, he will need to face obstacles and enemies who want to keep these people in prison.

name: Brick BiuBiu
description: A simple and casual shooting elimination game. Eliminate the bricks and get a higher score! Similar to the Tetris gameplay.

name: BeerLeague Superstar
description: BeerLeague Superstar is a Basketball Simulation RPG that lets you take control of your very own superstar. Customize his appearance and skillset then lead your team to BeerLeague glory and win the ultimate prize: The BeerLeague Championship.

name: Path of Vidya
description: Path of Vidya is a modern philosophical/sci-fi story-driven, turn-based RPG using the RPG Maker VX Ace program.

name: The Bronx
description: Sin descripción

name: I'm Strongest Legend
description: A first-person sword action game. The game is completed when the condition is achieved and you reached the destination.

name: Jaunt
description: Minimalist Rhythm Clicker. Click the shapes within quick succession to regain health and increase score until you reach the end of the song.

name: Fantasy Mahjong Connect
description: Fantasy Mahjong connect is a tile-matching puzzle game. Simply connect pairs adjacent to each other and on the outer edge of the board. Now the time is limited!

name: Nyctophobia: Devil Unleashed
description: A single-player pyschological horror game that will take you to the deepest and darkest secrets of the asylum.

name: Death Realm
description: Once you enter the Death Realm, you are bound to abandon hope. Do you think you can take on the most powerful?

name: Coastline Flight Simulator
description: Fly with your planes through the huge open world! Transport goods, trade and complete recon missions. Discover all settlements in the coastal landscape, the islands and the desert. Upgrade your planes and paint them in the colors of your choice!

name: Go Rocket
description: An arcade game about a rocket flying in endless space.

name: Dire Wolf Game Room
description: Collect your favorite tabletop and digital Dire Wolf board games in one convenient virtual place!

name: Fallout 76: Steel Reign
description: Steel Reign brings the conclusion of the Brotherhood of Steel storyline. You arrive back at Fort Atlas to find the tensions between Paladin Rahmani and Knight Shin have reached a boiling point. After swarms of Super Mutants start to appear and people are reported missing, how will you guide the Brotherhood? Will you take the side of justice or will you remain committed to duty?

name: Shooty 2D
description: Shooty 2D is a gun battle game. You can set up a room and fight with your friends.

name: Ropin' Ranch
description: Welcome to Ropin' Ranch, the ultimate Free-To-Play online ranch game that invites you to step into the boots of a seasoned rancher. In this expansive world, you'll take charge of your very own ranch, tame wild horses, and breed horses with real-world genetics. Unlock horses in over 150+ colors and get unique horses every time with markings! Ropin' Ranch offers an immersive and educational experience, blending the thrill of ranch life with the intricacies of horse genetics, illnesses, and more. Raise goats for meat, milk, or showcase their excellence in the show ring, and for the first time, experience the joys of managing gentle giants - cows! Train your cows for work or show, or raise them for meat or milk and sell them to the rodeo! Ropin' Ranch also strives to bring awareness to real world problems such as horse overpopulation, wild horse problems, cattle factory farming and more.

name: Ys IX: Monstrum Nox - Launch Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Danganronpa: Resort Killing
description: A new killing game begins as you and 15 other participants enter... A resort? You play as Yu Narukami from the persona series. Things seem off right from the start but things only continue to get stranger in this crossover fan game based off of the Danganronpa series by Spike Chunsoft. Featuring characters from Persona, Re:Zero, Yugioh, Super Mario, Touhou, Konosuba, River City, YiiK, Katawa Shoujo, Danganronpa, as well as Gordon Ramsey. Try to survive and uncover the truth inside this deadly resort.

name: Ys IX: Monstrum Nox - Attachments Bundle
description: Adorn your Monstrums with an entire wardrobe of more than 30 attachments, self-assertion panels, headwear, and weapons!

name: A Memoriam to a Fallen Furry Friend
description: A twine memoriam for the author's puppy.

name: A Plumber For All Seasons
description:
Each world represents a different season — there's a Spring world, a Summer world, a Fall world, and a Winter world. (And some more!) Almost all the graphics are custom and hand-made.

A Plumber For All Seasons features:

-37 levels with 41 exits
-almost entirely custom graphics, all of them hand-made
-a focus on interesting, season-themed scenery and fun levels
-an original soundtrack by some of SMWC's finest musicians
-rewards and easter eggs for completionists

name: Warframe: Sisters of Parvos
description: Parvos Granum’s days of collecting grain are far behind him. His newest grand achievement, born of technology and a desire for family, has finally come to fruition. Modeled with the latest in Corpus advancements, the Sisters of Parvos are ready to claim their Sectors and your lives.

name: Deliver Us From Evil
description: Romance supernatural bachelors and investigate humanity’s dark wishes!

name: Lexagrana
description: Lexagrana is a new take on the brain teaser word puzzles, utilizing unique sliding block puzzle mechanism with shifting letters, combined with the classic form-the-words game. Each time you move a block, the letter printed on it will shift to the next letter in alphabetical order, and the move count will be deducted. Move all the blocks to form the correct words based on a specific topic in each level. Test your skill on dozens of challenging handcrafted word puzzles.

name: Ys IX: Monstrum Nox - Digital Deluxe Edition
description: The Digital Deluxe Edition of Ys IX: Monstrum Nox includes the full game and a trove of 25 DLCs, including costumes, attachments, materials, and consumable items.

name: 100% Orange Juice: Railway Runners Pack
description: This Extra Character Pack for 100% Orange Juice adds 2 all-new playable characters from developer Orange_Juice - Lone Rider and Merchant, both Stage 3 bosses from "Flying Red Barrel", as well as character and announcer voices for them!

name: Tiger Tank 59 I: Black Hill Fortress MP027
description: "Tiger Tank 59" is a top-down shooting game. Players need to control their tanks, through the enemy lines, break the enemy base, and defeat all the enemy tanks. The DLC include the map pack 027.

name: Tiger Tank 59 I: Black Hill Fortress MP059
description: "Tiger Tank 59" is a top-down shooting game. Players need to control their tanks, through the enemy lines, break the enemy base, and defeat all the enemy tanks. The DLC include the map pack 059.

name: Tiger Tank 59 I: Black Hill Fortress MP026
description: "Tiger Tank 59" is a top-down shooting game. Players need to control their tanks, through the enemy lines, break the enemy base, and defeat all the enemy tanks. The DLC include the map pack 026.

name: Tiger Tank 59 I: Black Hill Fortress MP100
description: Tiger Tank 59 is a top-down shooting game. In this game, players need to control their tanks, through the enemy lines, break the enemy base, or defeat the enemy tanks. The DLC include the map pack 100.

name: Tiger Tank 59 I: Black Hill Fortress MP096
description: Tiger Tank 59 is a top-down shooting game. In this game, players need to control their tanks, through the enemy lines, break the enemy base, or defeat the enemy tanks. The DLC include the map pack 096.

name: Pixel Cup Soccer: Ultimate Edition
description: Pixel Cup Soccer: Ultimate Edition is a casual retro style soccer game, a great evolution from the previous edition. It's dynamic, arcade, with a fast paced gameplay, with just the fun part of soccer! The game has pixel art graphics with the retro style of the games from the 90’s, evoking nostalgia!

name: Keep Trying! Zombie Apocalypse
description: Prove yourself in different levels in the fight against zombies - the best: your community helps you. Your community can support you via stream in the fight against the undead monsters with ammunition or new weapons. At the same time, they can also put a horde of new zombies in front of you.

name: Fill & Cross: Pirate Riddles
description: Arrr! Solve the riddles of an old captain Flint and find the pirate treasure!

name: Scarred Stars
description: Enter amusement park from hell and escape with your sanity - if you can!

name: Neon Parkour
description: In Neon Parkour, where you control a blue cube make challenging tracks and get your cube near your partner! Be careful, this game is really hard.

name: Aran's Bike Trip
description: Go on a 2 day ride in the Netherlands and explore the Dutch countryside, woods and heathlands through a whole bunch of 360º photos. Will Aran live to tell the tale?? (spoiler: he does)

name: 1001 Jigsaw Legends of Mystery 2
description: Reveal fantastic secrets with 1001 Jigsaw. Legends of Mystery 2. 500 photos to prove the existence of magic!

name: Hitler on the Moon
description: The dictatorship and Quarantine did not end, so the Japanese authorities sent their spy into space ...

name: VR Balloon Flying over Tokyo and Hokkaido
description: In this VR world, not only the beautiful natural scenery of Japan is displayed in front of the players, but also the players are in a unique cultural environment built in Japanese-style scenes and experience a strong exotic atmosphere.

name: Jiang Hu Xing
description: Sin descripción

name: Norega
description: Norega is a game where you play as Kurt, a Knight in training, and your task is to feed up Kurt's stats so that he can improve in Strength and be able to defeat the tougher monsters found on the outskirts of Norega.

name: The Wolf's Den
description: The Wolf's Den is a suspenseful first person experience through a dark atmospheric mountain. Explore a mysterious train tunnel on your way to escape from a tragic accident that destroyed you and your partner's lab and uncover the truth behind the mysteries that surround you. Enter The Wolf's Den!

name: Dash Lamb
description: Dash lamb is a single-screen platformer. Dash to avoid the darkness below, your fire is our ruin...our salvation.

name: Game For Anna
description: Hello Anna. I made a game for you. We can play together as we used to.

name: Fire Opal
description: A nice and relaxing puzzle game with over 400 levels of varying difficulty. Play with positive and negative tetris-like shapes to reach each level’s target. Challenge yourself to solve maps the fastest, or with the least amount of steps. And most of all, have fun!

name: Indigo 7
description: Indigo 7 is a color-based single-player and multiplayer game. As you follow the plot through comic-style cinematics, you’ll face different battles and unlock a lot of single-player and local PVP modes that tell the rest of the story. The match rules vary in each mode, but the challenge always stays the same: choose a number of colors to use and make the board yours before your opponent does!

name: Rain Island: Orange
description:
Rain Island: Orange is a one small hold & Gun, boss Rush mini-game of Casual difficulty!
This beautiful place was built only for simple fun! Choose the character and difficulty level that best suits you and enjoy a short, simple but colorful boss rush minigame!

name: Oddworld: Soulstorm - Day 1 Oddition
description:
Abe is not the typical hero you would expect. He does not carry weapons, nor is he trained in any martial art. Yet he will have to face an impossible threat from increasingly violent and manipulative powers that will try to destroy him and his race.

The Oddworld: Soulstorm Day One Oddition includes Oddworld: Soulstorm and one exclusive embossed metal case.

name: Watch Dogs: Legion - Bloodline
description: Vigilante hacker Aiden Pearce is back, and this time he's teaming up with Wrench in a new storyline set before the events of the main game.

name: Crowfall
description: Crowfall is a Massively Multiplayer Online Role Playing Game (MMORPG). The Worlds of Crowfall feature unique maps, rules, and victory conditions. Every World is different, and players join teams (Factions, Guilds or Noble Houses) to vie for control of each World.

name: Heretic Invades Doom
description: Two small maps done with new complevel MBF21.

name: Xiangzhe Xingchen yu Shenyuan
description: Xiangzhe Xingchen yu Shenyuan is a Chinese unofficial fan-made visual novel based on the game Genshin Impact.

developers.name: Ge Yi Yong Zhi Chanliang Dadui

name: Witch Hunter
description:
This game is a porn parody of the animated series W. I. T. C. H. and you will better understand the plot and get more pleasure from the game if you are familiar with this universe.

Although in general, this is not necessary at all.

name: Rise Up!
description: Rise Up!, a space adventure and survival game with hints of 4x that tests your strategic abilities and challenges your entrepreneurial skills. Scavenge for supplies. Recover and repurpose the mangled bits of robots and equipment. Repair and fly your drone before mining asteroids. Build your empire. Collect achievement badges as you progress. Rise Up! contains stunning visuals and an original soundtrack. The game also includes free updates and players will have the opportunity to make decisions on future updates.

name: Idol Queens Production
description:
An idol making simulation game, Idol Queens!

Produce your own idols in the way the real k-pop idols are produced!

name: Bright Girl
description: "Bright Girl" is a casual game where players can appreciate the unique legendary stories of many beautiful girls.

name: Kellogg's Gut Bacteria Reef
description: Explore the human gut like never before!

name: Abacus
description: Explore a mysterious and whimsical world in this retro 2D platformer-shooter, featuring cute pixel graphics, a catchy original soundtrack and swarms of explosive bees!

name: Solaris
description: Discover a space strategy game filled with conquest, betrayal and subterfuge. Build alliances, make enemies and fight your way to victory and galactic domination. Will it be you who will conquer the galaxy?

name: Fear
description: Fear - a horror game made in realistic 3D graphics, immersing in an atmosphere of horror and fear.

name: Myriavora
description: Myriavora is a roguelike swarm action shooter in a sci-fi setting. You unleash a storm of fire and ice upon giant spiders, dodging their frantic attacks via cool moves.

name: Grandiose
description: Grandiose is a little survival game created by one person !

name: Herdyn, Wanna be MaN
description: 2D platform game with one time saves

name: Ranger vs. Drones
description: This is a VR study.Your participation begins with our online survey.Please follow the link in the external links section.

name: Runo
description: A walking simulator about dear memories, overcoming obstacles, and finding your path. Experience a story inspired by finno-karelian folklore.

name: Meteor Genocide
description: Our only goal in this 2D space game is to reach the highest score by avoiding the meteor obstacles on our way.

name: Rubix Roller
description: This puzzle strategy colour game requires thinking and planning ahead. Procedural level generation gives you an endless and unique gameplay experience every single time. Features 5 different modes including 2 player split screen duel. Player customization, upgrades, and powers.

name: My Little Fruit Juice Booth
description: Start your own fruit juice business with your own fruit juice booth on a beautiful beach! Sell delicious drinks and make your customers happy! Serve delicious drinks in various flavours and blend various fruits and juices into juicey drinks. My little fruit juice Booth is a casual shop tycoon game where you need to fulfil each customers request by blending the requested drinks with the various ingredients.

name: Prophunt
description: Hide among the various props of the world, or find the imposters who are hiding among the props.

name: Base Jump
description: Base Jump is a fast-paced competitive action platformer available for one or two players locally.

name: A Plague Tale: Innocence - Cloud Version
description: A Plague Tale: Innocence, on PlayStation 4, Xbox One and PC, tells the grim story of two siblings fighting together for survival in the darkest hours of History. This new video game from Asobo Studio sends you on an emotional journey through 14th-century France, with gameplay combining adventure, action and stealth, supported by a compelling story. Follow the young Amicia and her little brother Hugo, who face the brutality of a ravaged world as they discover their purpose to expose a dark secret. On the run from the Inquisition's soldiers, surrounded by unstoppable swarms of rats incarnating the Black Death, Amicia and Hugo will learn to know and trust each other as they struggle for their lives against all odds.

name: Boulders: Puzzle
description: Boulders: Puzzle is a game that challenges your logic and spatial thinking. You take control of a cuboid and must traverse the level in three dimensions to reach the goal cube and use the environment to modify the cuboid's length to get past obstacles.

name: Gun Sprint
description:
Flip the gun and move forward to reach the goal!

When you tap the screen, the gun will shoot and flip forward or backward!
Focus on the tap timing, shoot the enemies, and get high score!

name: Chthonic Deities
description: Large Knave-textured underground lava fortress. It is based on the Progs_dump mod (included) and comes with a few new models, sounds, and a custom music track. The map and qc sources are included.

name: Down the Gutter
description: Around medium-sized cistern/sewer level. The map source is included.

name: Super Mario Stellato
description: A Japanese made hack with stars of varying difficulty, act specific stars, and very large levels. This hack has 107 stars

name: Five Nights at Chuck E. Cheese's: Rebooted
description: This is an official complete reboot of the popular 2015 FNaF fangame "Five Nights at Chuck E. Cheese's." Featuring new mechanics, graphics, and more while still keeping the spirit of the original game.

name: Project Fog: The Wounded
description: Play the character of Cheryl who got trapped in a mysterious foggy city. Wounded, she barely managed to enter an establishment to escape from the monster. She was then greeted by a man named Norman who rushed and killed the monster chasing after her. Norman tended Cheryl's wound after and left her some supplies to survive. The clock is ticking for Norman as someone dear to him is missing, and soon he'll have to leave Cheryl alone.

name: Project: Summer Ice - Bowling: Story One - Jane Version
description: Sin descripción

name: Gig Life
description: After literally living under a rock for years, you emerge hungry and thirsty. You'll have to take on low-paying "gigs" in order to survive.

name: Homeward
description: Homeward is a relaxing puzzle game.

name: Get to the Top: Breakthrough Gaming Arcade
description: Sin descripción

name: Project: Summer Ice - Bowling: Story One - Pammy Version
description: Sin descripción

name: Salvagette
description:
Swipe to move in each of the four directions. Ram into things to destroy them, but avoid the dangerous projectiles.
Upgrade your ship with multiple levels of each of the FOUR upgrades.
Discover each of the FIVE endings, and unlock new music tracks!
Overcome 11 different enemy types, each with a distinct 'elite' form.
Watch replays of your attempts, and see your long-term statistics.
Earn your freedom!
This is an enhanced version of my game 'Salvage', remade and expanded in Godot. On top of new features (listed above), it is now available as a native application on mobile and PC. This should allow it to keep running smoothly into much longer runs, something the original game definitely had trouble with!

name: Par 1 Golf 7
description: 18 holes, 18 lives, its you against the 2d golf course in Par One Golf 7! To line up your shot, touch the golf ball and drag back then release to shoot. Learn the tricks and beat the golf course. The seventh installment of Par One Golf will challenge you and frustrate you just like real golf!

name: Pistol shooting: Realistic gun simulator
description: The game is a simulator of shooting a pistols Beretta M9, Luger P08, Colt 1911, Makarov

name: Airlines Deluxe
description: Airlines Deluxe is a game made by Thomas "Safariminer" Althot in 2021 with the Unity game engine. The game is a 3D platformer set in the sky, the goal being to hop from platform to platform until you reach the finish line.

name: DJ Meow
description: A simple game is for kids under 5 years old. With this game, a kid can mix different sounds of cats, make cat's music and make his parents happy. Besides music, this game is also about the love for pets.

name: Drifters Don't Brake
description: Use your drifting skills to beat all the stages and prove you are the real Drift King.

name: Midsummer Madness
description: Midsummer Madness is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls.The game is perfect for relaxing.

name: Super Archer
description: Nock, Draw, Loose! There is unlimited number of targets in front of you, and it is up to you to find out how many can you hit. Do not give up, try again and your skills will improve with every game. Release the arrow at the right moment to shoot target directly in the middle and progress. Get as far as you can to unlock different skins. Number of your arrows is limited. You are loosing them every time you miss. Can you beat your own records and became the ultimate archer?

name: Trakker
description:
Guardians of the digital Realms called TRAKKERS
navigate the maze-like Node structures and defend
them from the insidious viral intruders out to consume all.

name: The Tomorrow War: White Spike Invasion
description: Exterminate the human race in this arcade action shooter! Thirty years in the future, Earth is besieged by a global alien menace. Become the alien threat and destroy the earthlings once and for all as you blast through wave after wave of their remaining forces!

name: Super Metroid: Y-Faster 2 Furious
description:
So why faster? Because you should.

This is the second part of the Y-Faster 2 project. It pays hommage to five more past hacks, memorable for good and bad reasons, with my own twists added of course.

name: 1 Hungry Peasant
description:
1 Hungry Peasant must collect 100 Potatoes.

Created for Moonjam 2021: https://jam.moon2.tv/

name: Droptic
description:
Select column, drop block and see what happen.

Fill bars above to explode rocks.

Get the highest score you can.

name: KWRPG Buster!!
description: KWRPG Buster!! is the newest entry in the long-running KWRPG series. Run and gun your way through more than 8 colourful and exciting levels! Defeat the bosses to gain new powers and confront your evil doppelgänger!

name: Multiplayer.Golf
description: Multiplayer.Golf is a web-based multiplayer minigolf game, made from scratch in JavaScript. It features 20 playable holes, with more coming very soon.

name: Deathbed Lullabye
description:
Deathbed Lullabye is an English Yume Nikki fangame created for Dream Diary Jam 5. It differs from traditional fangames due to how the player only has 7 opportunities to enter the dream world before they are forced to trigger an ending. The dream world changes across 7 nights, with events, NPCs and locations becoming accessible and inaccessible depending on what night it is.

In the year 2004 within a hospital in Mexico City, you play as “Teicuh Maria Yayauhqui Calli,” age 37, a widow and musician. She's also terminally ill and is full of regrets about the questionable life she lived. She only has 7 days to live before she succumbs to her illness. If she either passes on peacefully or ends up in purgatory depends on the player's actions.

name: The Elephant in Her Room
description:
Sometimes a single-minded love can be too heavy. It's like an elephant. Go through her prejudiced gaze and tell her how attractive you really are.

Sokoban with some twists and romance.

name: Spinner
description: Sin descripción

name: Auger;Zenith
description: Auger;Zenith is a limit-removing project brought to you by the Doomer Boards planet hackers. Auger;Zenith is also the ultimate cyberpunk doom project.

name: Billionaire Lovers
description: You’re a broke college graduate. Your rich, distant uncle has just shown up out of nowhere and given you 100 million dollars! You’re now one of the ultra-rich and getting ready to move into a downtown garden mansion. And right at this moment, four handsome men come into your life. Could this be… the romance you’ve been waiting for!? But wait, there’s something behind their smiles that says otherwise…

name: The Little Black Bestiary: The Salted Cookies of Carthaginia
description: A modern fantasy slice-of-life visual novel about what it's like to have a retired world-conquering lich queen for a girlfriend where you get to make inconsequential decisions about how you spend your afternoon together.

name: Dungeon Brawlers
description: Dungeon Brawlers is a local multiplayer PvP battle game where you battle your friends to become the King of the Dungeon. Battle it out with swords, hammers, lasers, spears, and the power of current dungeon king: The Cyclops.

name: Neokaiju
description: NEOKAIJU is a fast-paced destructive platformer game where you play as an ever-evolving kaiju wreaking havoc on the city beneath you. Save the baby kaiju trapped in power cells scattered through the city, race to destroy as much as you can within the time limit, and level up to your ultimate form!

name: Vandozer
description: Take control of Vandozer's three pistons to jump, skid, and cling your way through many challenging levels!

name: Hope's Farm
description: Match your way through an incredible farming adventure. Grow crops, plant trees, raise adorable animals and customize a wonderful farm.

name: 2K1X Subzero Heroes
description: Sin descripción

name: Enigma of Sector Sigma
description: 5-map wad. Pistol starts are the intended experience, but continuous playthroughs are supported too.

name: Stygian Flowers
description:
Stygian Flowers is a puzzle RPG about someone combing through the underworld to drag back her friend. The afterlife’s a big place, but luckily, some of its residents don’t mind helping out.

In a land like this, enemies are a given. Slowly expand your skillset to defeat tough opponents; there are no levels, no grinding, and no random encounters, so the only way to win is to cobble together a solid plan.

Well, a little luck can’t hurt too.

name: Super Mario Flash 2: SMW Remake
description: A SMW Hack remake of Super Mario Flash 2, a Flash game based on Super Mario World, developed by Pouetpu in 2011.

name: Evilmun 2
description: Evilmun 2 is the continuation of the successful part of the game and part of the Evilmun trilogy. You play as a mage and a knight in new incomprehensible and unforgettable map locations that you will have to go through using two powers, Mage's powers and Knight's powers!

name: Varooom 3D
description: Feel the awesome power of 60FPS 3D racing!

name: Solitaire Stories
description: Behold! The world’s greatest card game, Solitaire... now with progressive difficulty storylines, gorgeous deck designs, daily challenges, global leaderboards, and a weird sense of humor. If you like classic Klondike Solitaire and have a wild imagination, you’re going to love Solitaire Stories.

name: A Firefighter's Boxing Matches
description: A PuzzleScript game about boxing matches.

name: Digdig.io
description: Sin descripción

name: Broccoli Quest II: The Dark Sacrament
description:
ON THE HALLOWED NIGHT OF THE HELL MOON...

Your oven is broken.

What starts as an errand merely to repair your broken oven quickly (d)evolves into a journey to prevent certain doom at the hands of a broccoli-shortage-causing cult known only as "BLOOD GUYS".

name: MontanaBlack Kylo's Rescue
description:
"You're kidnapping Kylo just because I don't want to pay 80% taxes?! You will regret this! I will destroy you!" - MontanaBlack. Fight your way through the tax office with Monte to free Kylo. But beware: the building is teeming with dangerous enemies waiting for you!
To survive on the higher floors, you'll need to equip yourself with better gear and stronger guns. Can you manage to collect a complete set of equipment in purple?

name: Fears to Fathom: Home Alone
description: In the first episode of Fears to Fathom you play as Miles, a 14 years old kid who is home alone while his parents are out of town for work. He soon finds himself in trouble as the story unfolds, would he make it through the night?

name: Pre-Strike
description: Strike your enemies before they strike you! Pre-Strike is a casual clicker game, focused on upgrading your camp and unlocking new characters in order to build up resources. The more resources you have, the stronger you are in this post-apocalyptic idle game!

name: Labyrinths of the World: The Game of Minds - Collector's Edition
description: Desperate Times Call for Desperate Measures...

name: The Greatest Penguin Heist of All Time
description: The Greatest Penguin Heist of All Time is a physics-based heist game where you and your friends gear up to take on some of the most challenging heists conducted by penguins in penguin history.

name: Revizor
description: "Revizor" is a visual novel, a simulator of an office employee. You can flirt with colleagues at work, go on dates, earn and spend money, do business, meet friends, conduct audits, get sick and heal, listen to the radio with exclusive tracks, make decisions, run errands, and much more!

name: Pictooi
description: Welcome to Pictooi, a relaxing logic puzzle game where you fill in cells to solve puzzles and reveal pictures. Professor Ishida is your host, mentor, and friend. "Oh, hello! Did you know your brain is kind of like a muscle? Let's exercise your brain by challenging it with logic puzzles. Solving logic puzzles can expand your mind! I look forward to sharing our journey together." - Professor Ishida Approachable: Suitable for beginners and experienced nonogram lovers. Pictooi features 300 logic puzzles, ranging from easy to challenging, across board sizes of 5x5, 10x10, 15x15, and 20x20.

name: Kids: Farm Puzzle
description: Kids: Farm Puzzle offers unique fun and relaxing jigsaw puzzles! The game shows you cute pictures of farm animals, which can be divided into different numbers of pieces to make your challenge easier or harder.

name: 觉梦：赛博
description: Sin descripción

name: Cyber Girl 1.0: Booting
description: You will be controlling Tala, a female cyborg full of mysteries and with amazing abilities. It is time to boot up her system and help in her quest of revenge against the person who completely changed her life!

name: Island Diary
description: Let's work together to survive on the deserted island!

name: Beth the Exhibitionist
description: Beth is locked out of her hotel room...naked. Your job is to help her make the right choices that'll lead her to clothes without getting arrested or being seen by too many people in a short Choose-Your-Own-Adventure game with 3D Images. Includes Miku's Strip Trivia Night.

name: Company of Heroes: Back to Basics
description: Back to Basics is a free mod for Company of Heroes that reworks core features of the original gameplay to put further focus on strategy, tactics, and player skill. Back to Basics can be played PvP, but also features AI opponents that can challenge battle-hardened players.

name: Ambush: Convoy Strike
description: Deploy unique and powerful unmanned military turrets and stop the advancing enemy convoys!

name: Zyconix
description: Zyconix is an exciting old school arcade-style puzzle game with four funky modes where you must match similarly colored blocks to clear them from the play area. These falling blocks can be grabbed in any order, but once you’ve grabbed one, it will sink like a rock when you let it go!

name: Click Your Crush!
description: "Click Your Crush!", is a fascinating hentai clicker that features a lot of sexy, hot girls. Caress different parts of the body and this beauty will undress for you! In this game, you will definitely forget about the time and find the girl of your dreams!

name: 明明如月
description: Rougelike map generation makes your every adventure different. Reasonable match of lineup, selection of talent and purchase of equipment will affect the success or failure of every adventure. Whether you can become the Savior of this continent, let's have a try.

name: Revelation
description: Revelation is an intense arcade-style puzzle game from Krisalis where you spin color-coded interconnected dials inside clockwork locks to match colors and create chain reactions to open each safe. Thinking ahead is crucial, as each lock will affect adjacent locks when spun.

name: Russian City Sim
description: The atmosphere of the nuclear wasteland.

name: Hoverboard Chase
description: HoverBoard Chase - 3d hoverboard race where you have to dodge cops, earn influence points for tricks and monitor your character's health bar, because in the end you can get caught!

name: Calmed by the Dark: Leviathan
description:
Earth is now ruled by dragons, the last humans live in underground shelters, is up to Europa, Sofia, Claire, and Virginia to defy the gods and save the world!

Discover the ending to the Calmed by the Dark saga in our most ambitious game to date, where everything is going to be decided.

name: Soer Dolls
description: Soer Dolls is a horror adventure game in which you need to find enchanted dolls in order to save the small town of Lazyiville from the terrible curse that caused ghosts and monsters to appear in the city!

name: Samurai Shampoo
description: Melee-based roguelike dungeon crawler where a fallen samurai must retrieve his stolen Shampoo.

name: Game.exe
description: You bought a PC that belonged to a suicidal developer, do you dare to run "Game.exe"?

name: Vacation Adventures: Park Ranger 6
description: Spend a sensational summer vacation helping rangers run Pinecreek Hills National Park. It’s conservation challenge year and Pinecreek’s better than ever before!

name: Super Destronaut DX-2
description: Super Destronaut DX 2 is a retro space shooter with multiple modes. Test your abilities with the challenges or try to beat your high score in the arcade modes. Play against the clock, the more classical 3 lives, or even with limited bullets to see how many aliens you can destroy. Dodge and shoot enemies to the victory! This time they may not only come from above.

name: Slime VS. Female Hero Party
description: In this game you, as a slime, defeat four female heroes.

name: HyperFeat
description: A top down 2D space shooter bulethell with roguelike elements awaits you. Dodge, weave and shoot your way through waves of enemies while gaining upgrades trying to survive as long as possible.

name: Revolver and Co
description: It's 2038, and a late maniacal inventor has left behind a legacy of madness - coordinates to an island full of wealthy robots, a gun that asks questions, and a widow that's hired you to answer them. As Izzy Buspec, the newest recruit to Randco, take charge of their patented revolver as you explore the densely packed biomes of Corvynnia, bringing down hordes of docile robots in a money-making adventure. Every time you fire, you'll have to answer one of over 2,000 trivia questions with answers based on numbers, percentages, geography, dates, and more - the further you are from the actual answer, the more of its own ammunition the revolver will discharge. If you run out, it's back to Randco HQ to reload! Revolver and Co features 105 story levels across 7 unique worlds and 12 question themes which will test you on a wide range of subjects, tied together with humorous debriefings between Izzy and her maniacal boss before the start of each mission. Or if you're looking for more of a challenge, have a go at one of the Endless challenges, which pits you against a barrage of questions until you finally succumb to an empty revolver chamber. You can even unlock more Endless challenges by completing the story levels, including a gruelling hour-long session where the only thing you have to lose is time.

name: Dungless
description: Dungless is a 2D platformer with a procedurally generated world that will create a unique adventure for you every time that never happens again. Fight monsters, collect gold, go deeper and deeper into the dungeons.

name: My Maitê
description: Maitê is a very intelligent girl, but she lives over the moon. This is why her dad has to go there and bring her back to Earth in this 50 stages long incredible adventure. Jump over clouds, balloons, trampolines and into special portals in order to get to the ending of this pixel art made beautiful game.

name: Battlegrounds Mobile India
description: Battlegrounds Mobile India is an online multiplayer battle royale game which is created and published by the Korean game development company Krafton. This is a rebranded game of Playerunknown's Battlegrounds which will exclusively available in India.

name: Red Wings: Aces of the Sky - Baron Edition
description:
Experience the fascinating history of the Great War and become the king of the skies! Red Wings: Aces of the Sky is a dynamic action game that will show you amazing battles from the pages of the history in a brand new arcade gameplay style. Use your unique skills to take your opponents down, develop your deadly pilot aim and become the true ace of the sky.

Red Wings: Aces of the Sky Baron Edition includes:
- Base Game
- Art Book
- Poster

name: Foodtruck Arena
description: Foodtruck Arena an unconventional mix of car combat and football game, combines two things that make the world go round: food and sports. Become one of the legendary chefs, take part in an unforgettable tournament, battle against formidable opponents, and climb to the top of the culinary world!

name: Foodtruck Arena
description: FoodBall, an unconventional mix of car combat and football game, combines two things that make the world go round: food and sports. Become one of the legendary chefs, take part in an unforgettable tournament, battle against formidable opponents and climb to the top of the culinary world!

name: Silly Tower
description: SillyTower is a physics based game where you must build the highest possible tower!

name: Dr.Roland
description:
The patient is suffering a terrible virus infection, and your role as Dr.Roland is to get rid of those ugly and funky viruses, throwing them colored vitamin capsules.

If four elements of the same color get together, all of them will disappear, and you will be one step closer to cure the infection.

Dr.Roland is a tetrislike game that you can enjoy alone with your Amstrad CPC, or in a fun battle with a friend side to side.

name: M Hold'em
description: M Hold'em is an app where you can play the mind sport “Texas Hold'em” with tramps and points.

name: Grooverland
description:
"Magic comes with a price. But on your birthday, all your expenses are paid. Welcome to Grooverland."

Grooverland is a large parser game that takes over two hours to complete. It is based on the works of author and programmer Chandler Groover, although it does not require previous knowledge of his games to play.

name: Tamagotchi Pix
description: Tamagotchi Pix is a color-screen virtual pet released in mid-2021. It is the first color Tamagotchi to be produced specifically for an international market, and was not released in Japan. The Pix features a camera and touch buttons, which tie into the new gameplay.

name: Spooky Spirit Shooting Gallery
description: Shoot to defeat the Spooky Spirits! Aim carefully and shoot non-stop in Carnival Mode. Fire at the goodies in the gallery or the ghosts in the haunted house – Choose either stage and take aim to defeat the spirits.

name: G-Mode Archives 35: Magical Fantasista II
description:
Lost and in search of "Akashic Records" ...
The second magic synthetic RPG that fights by making use of magic and individuality!

The second installment of the magical synthetic RPG "Magical Fantasista" series.
The three honor students of the Imperial Academy of Magic, Kamui, Mercurius, and Yuturna, were involved in a big incident during the final assignment at the end of the school year and decided to go on an adventure to solve it.

The three of them are good at attribute magic, sword magic, and star magic, each of which has different characteristics, and while synthesizing the magic obtained as a trophy and taking an exam at the dojo, while raising the magic level, they face the crisis of the Nebula country. I'll go.

Dungeons where the terrain changes every time you enter, and the ability equipment system where you can enjoy a wide variety of training are also alive and well.

Enjoy the magnificent world of Magical Fantasista, where many powerful enemies are waiting!

name: Ctrl/Esc
description: Ctrl/Esc is a Survival Horror Game, where you are a technician, fixing stuff in a school, while exploring all the rooms and discovering some strange information.

name: Fallen London: We Absolutely Meant to Go to Zee
description: An addon for Fallen London. The Exceptional Story for July, 2021.

name: We Dwell in Possibility
description: We Dwell in Possibility is a queer gardening simulation shaped by intimacy and politics. It's the third world premiere in the Virtual Factory series, inviting artists to imagine new worlds in response to the physical architecture and artistic ambition of MIF's future home.

name: Madrid Noir
description: Madrid Noir is a 45 minute mystery adventure that unfolds across two acts in this VR film. With her uncle declared dead, a disenchanted young woman must delve into her memories to pick up his shadowy trail. Solving the puzzles of the past ain't gonna be easy!

name: Blooming Panic: Full Bloom Edition
description: Depressed day-in and day-out from a draining corporate job, you become invested in a fantasy webnovel and find a mysterious link to a fan server. Everyone is warm and welcoming, but three members take a special interest in you!

name: Chess Puzzle Adventure
description:
The King and Queen have been captured and only you can save them. Journey though 100 levels of puzzles based on chess principles. Use your chess skills to outsmart the enemy as you make your way through multiple settings. Along the way, you will encounter new challenges that will further test your chess prowess. Are you ready?
New to chess? The tutorial will introduce how the different chess pieces attack and you can always tap the Chart button if you need a quick reminder.

name: Fire Emblem: Sword of Heaven and Earth
description:
Fire Emblem: Sword of Heaven and Earth is a ROM Hack of Fire Emblem: The Blazing Blade created by 38%. An English translation was created by Nasaelo.

War looms over Elibe once again. Zephiel, King of Bern was the one who started the trigger, but thanks to the efforts of Roy, Prince of Pherae, his plan never came to fruition. Before these events, Saya, daughter of Chief Lyndis, prepares for what will be her last training. Embark with Saya on the other side of the coin of the events of this ruthless and cold war.

name: Sky Warriors: Blazing Clouds
description: Fly & fight with war jets! Join the Sky Warriors today and become an ace pilot! Experience the thrill of realistic aerial battles and engaging enemies in adrenaline-packed 3D dogfights!

name: Dead by Daylight: Ultimate Edition
description: The Ultimate Edition gives you access to the base game of Dead by Daylight as well as 34 original Killers and Survivors from previously released chapters.

name: Streetball Allstar
description: A fast-paced multiplayer basketball game.

name: Tiger Tank 59 I: Battleship MP084
description: Tiger Tank 59 Ⅰ: Battleship is a top-down shooting game. Players need to control their tanks, through the enemy lines, break the enemy base, or defeat the enemy tanks. This DLC includes map pack 084.

name: Tiger Tank 59 I: Battleship MP011
description: Tiger Tank 59 Ⅰ: Battleship is a top-down shooting game. Players need to control their tanks, through the enemy lines, break the enemy base, or defeat the enemy tanks. This DLC includes map pack 011.

name: Tiger Tank 59 I: Battleship MP038
description: Tiger Tank 59 Ⅰ: Battleship is a top-down shooting game. Players need to control their tanks, through the enemy lines, break the enemy base, or defeat the enemy tanks. This DLC includes map pack 038.

name: Tiger Tank 59 I: Battleship MP098
description: Tiger Tank 59 Ⅰ: Battleship is a top-down shooting game. Players need to control their tanks, through the enemy lines, break the enemy base, or defeat the enemy tanks. This DLC includes map pack 098.

name: Memory Lane 2
description: Your favorite memory training game is back! Now with more card sets and with more music! Select from 8 different card set Listen to more than 30 relaxing and inspiring music tracks. Unlock new factoids and learn about how human brain works and how our memory functions.

name: The Legend of Neverland
description: The Legend of Neverland is an MMORPG set in a universe called Cabala. Something strange is happening in this utopia, and it's up to you to protect the innocent civilians who are being attacked by evil forces. After designing your character's appearance, you can start exploring this open world with more surprises than meets the eye.

name: MergeCrafter
description:
MergeCrafter is a unique tycoon game where you bring the best talents to unlock and merge on new lands. Play all the puzzles and learn new merge mechanics to discover new Biomes!

Tap, Build & Merge! Lead your empire in the best puzzle game available. Conquer Runaria with your own 3D pixel block simulator!

name: Arcade Archives: Raiden
description: Raiden is a shooting game released by Seibu Kaihatsu in 1990. Get aboard the ultra high-altitude fighter-bomber Raiden and protect the Earth from a sudden alien invasion. A variety of stages and power-up items provide lots of excitement for you to enjoy.

name: Spider Solitaire Collection
description:
Do you love Spider Solitaire (also known as "Spider" or "Spider Patience"), but want a bigger challenge? Now you can play Spider Solitaire and other popular variants with different levels of difficulty.

The collection contains 10 different games:
• Beetle
• Black Widow
• Mrs. Mop
• Scorpion
• Simple Simon
• Spider
• Spider (2 suits)
• Spider (1 suit)
• Spiderette
• Tarantula

name: The Last Defense!
description: You are the last hope of humanity! Defend humanity by using your towers, buildings, walls and missiles. Plan your tactics, manage your sources, place your turrets to most effective positions and defeat the enemy!

name: Logic Car
description: Logic Car is a coding-based puzzle game in which you program cars to achieve goals. Check the conditions given in each unique stage and take advantage of the various functions installed in the vehicle. Sometimes the laws of physics can be the solution. Now is the time to unleash your creativity.

name: Chuhou Joutai 2: Paraided!
description: The true strength of The Real Driller is his wisdom.

name: Overlord
description:
Enjoy awesome Real-time Multiplayer Battles PVP. Use your excellent skills to kill other players to become survival and winner.

Overlord: Fantasy Battle Royale is a real-time battle online game. Allow 10 players in the battle, with many modes and awesome features, Overlord is the best real-time PVP game experience on mobile!

Players can craft unlimited equipment with different styles, can customize your character's appearance as you want, and many more features are waiting for you to explore.

name: A Kiss from Death
description: Romance immortal beings in a world of epic fantasy! Burn castles with a dragon! Raise the dead with a lich! Write poetry with a cursed prince!

name: Rust: Voice Props Pack
description: Tune in to the Voice Props Pack - a selection of audio themed items for Rust!

name: Kuro Tactics
description: Kuro Tactics is a unique Turn Based Strategy RPG with Grid Movement that was inspired by Game Boy Advance favorites. Strengthen your Heroes by Leveling, Weapons, Gear & Artifacts to defeat all types of nefarious enemies on your path to victory!

name: Magnus Failure
description: Magnus Failure is an isometric exploration and adventure game with logical elements. The protagonist of the game is a person who, for unknown reasons, finds himself in the isolation of other people and scans the radio in search of a signal.

name: Knight Slave: The Dark Valkyrie of Depravity
description: This game is a Dark Fantasy RPG featuring an eye-eyed girl who slashes through anyone and anything that stands in her way.

name: The Fermi Paradox
description: The Fermi Paradox is a choice-driven sci-fi narrative strategy game in which your decisions in one corner of the galaxy can upend entire civilizations in another. Guide species through millennia and help them explore the vastness of space, make contact and, perhaps, create harmony.

name: When I reincarnate, I'm a cube!?
description: The world you've been reincarnated into is a cube!? This is a quest-style light FPS.

name: Salt and Sails
description: Salt and Sails is a naval combat style game where you control a ship.

name: The Fear Island
description: The Fear Island is an online co-op survival horror game where players accidentally land on an island full of supernatural entities and need to find an escape vehicle and its necessary resources.

name: Kickerinho World
description: Welcome to the juggle world where you use your feet, legs, knees, chest, shoulders, and head to keep the ball in the air. Customize your character, discover various maps, learn epic kicks, and unlock new balls! Listen to soccer tips and master your skills to become a legendary football juggler. And remember - training makes perfect!

name: Marbles Rush
description: The game is an amazing three match puzzle game! Your target is to eliminate all the marble and don't let the chain reach the end. You elimate the balls by shooting the same color in the row to end up with a minimum of three of the same kind to eliminate them. Discover over 80 action packed levels and use different power ups to elimate the chain.

name: Consolation: Board Meeting
description: A multiplayer party game, with a darker undertone. Traverse a board game board in a board meeting for a chance to be on the board of directors! Welcome to Consolation.

name: Fear 2: The Disappeared 207
description: This is a puzzle-solving, survival, adventure, survival, and horror shooting game I made. The viewing angle of the game is from a bird's-eye view, and you will control Yang Tian (the protagonist) Continue to survive the monster's attacks and seek the truth.

name: Distant Dials
description: Distant Dials is a science-fiction MUSH (multi-user shared hallucination). It’s a multiplayer game requiring the player to create parts of the experience with others.

name: Battle for Antares
