description: Battle for Antares is a fast-paced strategy game. You grow your empire, colonize star systems, build planetary infrastructure and combat drones to battle your opponent. Will you focus on research to crush your opponent with superior technology? Or do you outnumber and overwhelm the enemy early on?

name: Caïssa Board
description: Caïssa Board is a modern chess GUI that is capable of interfacing with many chess engines while being tuned toward simplicity of use. It also provides tactical and strategic hints such as the possibility of forks or the controlled squares and is shipped with the public domain chess engine Gull 3.

name: DaCapo Delivers
description: A quick shopping game which increases in difficulty for 16 levels. You play as Sal DaCapo, a young boy in the 1930s. Start by supplying groceries to Mom and Pop's Pasta Place and Speakeasy, advance to have your own rackets, mob, and gun moll as the top boss.

name: Virtual Beepis
description: Virtual Beepis is a virtual pet gametoy inspired by electronic toys from the 90s and 00s. Keep your beepis happy, well-fed, and moving up in their world...until they die. But it's ok, you can always get a new one...

name: The Last Chimera
description: This is RPG use only mouse. The player "chimera" changes to next generation by execute specific events. You will know the meaning of "your birth" when you get to "that place". There are three levels of difficulty. If it's "Easy", you can enjoy the story purely without any trouble.

name: Dragon Question
description: Dragon Question is an edutainment software that combines mathematical exercises with the defense genre. You are Archmage Ryn, tasked with guarding the millennial kingdom of Mathateria. Defend the gates by solving math problems from hordes of monsters. Defend all four gates before a showdown with Isaac, the dragon of doom, and the main culprit behind the chaos.

name: Nekoba RocknRoll
description: The ultimate 2D action game where a cat with a bazooka fights! A variety of missions await you and your cat. Regain love and peace!

name: Prison Tycoon: Under New Management
description:
Design, build and run your own prison!

Plan and build your own prison from the ground up! Secure government grants, hire guards and staff and begin welcoming new prisoners in this reboot of the Prison Tycoon franchise.

The goal of a good Warden is not to punish their prisoners, it’s to rehabilitate them into productive members of society. In Under New Management, each inmate must work through their own issues that landed them in prison, and it’s your job to provide them with the help they need to get healthy.

“Prison Tycoon : Under New Management” is looking for a good Warden. Are you up for the job?

name: Crazy Insane Monster Invaders
description:
They're crazy. They're insane. They're Monsters.

Crazy Insane Monster Invaders are coming for us all.

You are the only defense,make those invaders pop.

Crazy Insane Monster invaders is a wacky fast paced retro inspired Game for all skill levels.

name: Half-Life: Restored
description: Previously known as Restore-Life, Half-Life: Restored is a fan made modification for Half-Life. This modification will stretch your Half-Life experience with unused, cut and retail version content from original game.

name: Moshikashite? Obake no Shatekiya
description:
Arcade medal games are fun to play, but you can never play enough, since you can only go as far as your wallet takes you. This is the Switch version designed to make these children's dreams come true.

In "Medal Mode", offers the same basic gameplay as the arcade version, you can play as long as you want without worrying about your wallet, witnessing ghosts that you couldn't find in the arcade and defeat bosses that you weren't able to defeat.

name: Wave War One
description: Battle your way through the trenches of World War I, pushing back enemies and advancing your position on the battlefield. Choose from 8 distinct unit types, decide who and when to deploy to fight your way through the single-player campaign. As a Commander, try different tactical options and learn from your mistakes to beat each level in the shortest time possible. The game features beautiful, stylized 3D graphics and audio that will let you immerse into the World War I setting even deeper.

name: Stand By Me
description: Embark on a journey with Pico in his books of adventures and discover a magnetic land in a groovy casual action game.

name: Infinity Kingdom
description: Conquer the city, discover the Infinity! Infinity Kingdom is a cartoon-style MMO Strategy game. As a resourceful Lord, you must defend the land of Norheim against the evil gnomes while protecting yourself from other invading players!

name: Old World
description: Old World is an epic, historical turn-based strategy game. Set in the classical era, Old World gives players the chance to not just build an empire but to found the greatest dynasty of its age.

name: Travel to Thailand
description: Travel to Thailand sends you on another amazing adventure with the Hudsons. Pack your bags for a trip to a tropical paradise!

name: Pokemon FireRed and LeafGreen+
description: Pokémon FireRed and LeafGreen+ is intended to be the definitive FireRed and LeafGreen experience. It adds many quality of life and gameplay conveniences to make the game more bearable to play in 2022, adds more postgame activities, but also maintains the original battle mechanics and Gen 3 feel as much as possible. It's made with the pokefirered decompilation from pret, and I consider it to be complete.

name: Slith
description: A five-map episode for Doom II with Thy Flesh Consumed-inspired visuals and Plutonia-like gameplay.

name: Chilled Chicken
description: A map made by 8 ppl thru discord. 500 monsters on UV but really it sounds longer than it is - you can probably bang it out in a half hour.

name: Adversary Tower
description: The evil wizard has used a poisonous potion to pollute the village's water supply. You must use the 7 steps of your Adversarial Thinking training to infiltrate his tower, steal back the potion of purity, and safely escape.

name: Cirque Eclipse: The Scarlet Curtain
description: Included in the Story Me app.

name: Trading Legend
description: Sin descripción

name: Yume wo Mita
description: Yume wo Mita is a traditional Japanese Yume Nikki fangame. You play as Fumitsuki and Koitsuki, whom you can alternate between through a love letter on their desks, exploring their respective dream worlds.

name: Apartment No. 9
description: Help Leah find happiness or lead her to ruin in this dark slice-of-life story about a teacher whose life is turned upside down when the homeless guy she often stares at out of her window shows up at her door, claiming to have found her purse.

name: Quake: Reliquary
description: First "alpha" version of a mod based on Copper with some new and modified weapons, such as a pistol and triple-barreled shotgun, and more challenging gameplay. It comes with two levels plus a start map: a medium-sized sewage facility and a large medieval castle dungeon. The map sources are included.

name: Postbird in Provence
description: Hop on your bike and become Marcel, the new postbird in town! Meet the lovely and quirky people of Montélimace and bring this charming village back to life. Set amongst the lavender fields and fanned by the sea breeze, take a real breath of provençal air.

name: The Three Princes and Adarna
description: An otome game very loosely based on the Filipino epic poem, "Ibong Adarna".

name: Tower Offender
description:
This game is all about stopping the Hero from getting to the tower to do what heroes to best. You will have some time to prepare and then can continue your efforts as he progresses.

A twist on the traditional tower defence genre, in this game you can run and jump around the level and place traps and obstacles that should hamper the progress of the hero. Once the hero arrives you can continue to move around and adjust the placement of traps, either by placing more, or by moving the ones you have already placed.

A health bar indicates how much damage the hero has received, and once the hero has no health left, the player wins and can progress to the next level.

name: Dream Park Story
description: Throw open the gates to a magical kingdom of fun and thrills! Create and customize your own amusement park. From humble attractions like the teacup ride or trampolines, you'll be able to build up to bigger and better things. You can even hire mascots and hold fantastic parades! What do your visitors like best? How can you improve? There's no better place to check up-to-the-minute feedback than the park's social media. Work hard, and you might attract the attention of famous online influencers!

name: Bomb Club
description:
If you have a knack for explosives, the Bomb Club welcomes you! Meet new bombs, uncover new challenges, and create awesome chain reactions in this explosive puzzle game!
Bring your best bomb-fu to detonate all bombs on the board in one single chain reaction. With dozens of bombs, hats and level types, you'll need more than your love of things that go 'BOOM' to succeed. Fortunately, the other club members will be there to guide you!

name: Froglike: The Frog Roguelike
description:
Survive until the end of time itself, dodging deadly enemies and growing stronger in this fast-paced adventure.
Keep the Lily of Time powered up as long as possible, gaining points and breaking highscores.
Unlock and upgrade a variety of items to help you your journey! We’ve got everything from time freezing ice cubes to environmentally friendly bombs!
Discover a variety of skins (alternate timeline frogs!) to play in style. There’s no limit to the ridiculousness of the designs, nor the froginess of their names.
Listen to the never-ending ramblings of Chronos, the physical manifestation of time.
Can you reach the literal end of time?!

name: A Curious Pastime
description: You are a young person of the Fir Cruthen, the mightiest (and drunkenest) nation of the Warhost. You've ventured forth to join the Warhost and make a mighty name for yourself. You'll do this by completing an increasingly arbitrary, never ending, serious of inane puzzles; given to you by a colourful cast of characters doing terrible Scottish accents. Will you be able to rise above the status of Background Noob and earn a name for yourself? Unlikely, you'll probably be dead before the weekend's over.

name: Osakabe
description: Osakabe is a first-person horror experience set in a haunted Japanese Castle. You'll need to struggle, run and hide to escape from Osakabe's fierce grasp. You'll explore your surroundings to find out about Osakabe's past and use your limited tools to turn the tides in your favor. You may also find familiar faces along the way that guide your path, but only if Osakabe doesn't find you first...

name: Carrot Slime 2
description:
Welcome to Carrot Slime 2!
Get to the golden carrot in the fastest time possible whilst picking up beetroots and normal carrots along the way!

name: Songs for a Hero: Definitive Edition
description:
Songs for a Hero is an old school sung-through video game extravaganza! Join an unlikely hero as he sings his way through a strange world full of floating platforms, bright and colorful enemies, and many other inexplicable phenomena in an adventure, unlike anything you have ever heard! This humorous old-school platformer features a fully dynamic soundtrack that reacts to your every input, meaning that the hero will always sing and crack jokes about whatever is happening to him, whenever it happens.
The Definitive Edition includes the Heavy Metal DLC "Songs for the Dead", the DLC "Skin Pack", the epilogue of the main campaign, and the Samba DLC "Samba for a Hero".

name: Reminiscence
description: You've only precious moments before time collapses onto itself to save your family. Warp, jump and rewind through time and space - and pray that whatever lives between it doesn't notice you.

name: GreedFall: The De Vespe Conspiracy
description:
Expand GreedFall’s RPG adventure with The de Vespe Conspiracy expansion, and discover a brand-new storyline on the island of Teer Fradee.
Navigate a web of intrigue, manipulation and secrets, as you unravel a nefarious conspiracy that threatens the balance of power. Explore a previously-undiscovered region of the island, battle strange new beasts and face off against a villainous new enemy faction in your hunt to uncover the truth.
This expansion brings a new region, enemy types, costumes, weapons and contracts, with a twisting narrative that expands on GreedFall’s acclaimed story.

name: Compacto: Idle Game
description: CompactO is an addicting idle game where you create colorful squares on a plane. Dominate the 3D Realm and infuse your planes into complex shapes to buy tons of upgrades!

name: Cloud Bashers DX
description: So, you wanna bash some clouds huh? Go through 10 worlds each with different cloud types and a boss that's out to take you down. Bash them all with your trusty bat and take back the skies!

name: Farm Fatale
description: Go head to head in high energy games to be the last standing who isn't an animal, and win!

name: Vampire Slave: A Yaoi Visual Novel
description: The world's most ancient vampire, a young and unprepared new leader of a centuries old vampire-hunting organization, thrust together by fate. Thalos knows he's found his beloved, but Dusty must never let himself grow close to a vampire.

name: Erotic Jigsaw Puzzle Summer
description: Challenging 6 x 6 jigsaw puzzle featuring summer sexy scenes on the beach by Lolita LineArt, on a smooth luxury graphical background.

name: Hentai Brick Breaker
description: Unlock beautiful hentai girls hidden behind bricks that you must break. Choose your girls and level from the gallery.

name: Paint Drying Simulator
description: This is literally a game about watch paint drying for 6 hours, so.. ..do you feel like wasting money and time? XD

name: The List
description: A young man is interviewed by the police only to turn up dead a week later. 3 years have passed, a special agent from Santa Fe navigates the police database in order to solve the mystery.

name: Roasting Report: A Narcotics Murder
description:
Detective Lee Kang-wool, who writes mystery during the day and novels at night. Then a female college student came to him.
Called a master of chemical engineering, she asks to find out who killed her beloved junior.
The suspects she brought in, however, reveal that there is another suspect.

name: Cross Numbers
description: A math based crossword style game.

name: Reigning
description: A singleplayer, story game where you can make decisions and read your way through history.

name: Car Driving Simulator
description: Car Driving Simulator is a street race game with cool racing cars, city traffic, and racing challenges! Experience extreme speed, do crazy airborne stunts and drift in city traffic on the street’s asphalt - go beyond the speed limit! Car Driving Simulator features racing upgrades and tuning for turbo speed, three race types for a variety of challenge, and lots of rewards for awesome driving. Choose from a wide variety of vehicles, stack your car with racing upgrades and gear to achieve truly turbo speed - progress as a racer and your ride will progress with you!

name: Snake It 'Til You Make It
description: Slide, slither and snake your way to victory! Shed the skin of previous puzzle games and worm your way through hours of fun!

name: Secret Agent HD
description: Secret Agent HD is a remaster and definitive release of 1992's Secret Agent, boasting an arsenal of new features, a level editor with Steam Workshop support, and a new episode with 16 never-before-played missions.

name: A Strange Hotel
description:
A Strange Hotel is a retro style atmospheric 2D puzzle platformer, with a few precision platformer levels in between.

Find clever solutions to the physics based puzzles of A Strange Hotel. In this short but sweet puzzle platformer you have to find solutions to simple and complex puzzles while using your vacuum to grab physics objects.

name: Lovely Kitchen
description: Lovely Kitchen is a 2D arcade game filled with donuts, pizzas and pies. Jumping from donuts and avoiding all clever traps, reach the final goal and wake up the cook.

name: Bodies of Water VR
description: Immerse yourself in this new and exciting, VR only, sports-based action arcade game. Learn how to Scuba Dive, Freedive and Snorkel over various action packed, exhilarating and challenging adventures!

name: Zannon
description: Zannon is our take on the classic shooters of the late 1980's and early 1990's. Blast your way through 10 challanging levels, collect awesome power-ups, battle numereous different enemies, base and gun platforms. - Love retro and you'll love Zannon.

name: Doki Doki Literature Club Plus!
description: Welcome to the club! Write poems for your crush and experience the terror of school romance in this critically-acclaimed psychological horror story.

name: The Wicked Days
description: The Wicked Days is a top-down shooter with rogue-like elements. You are one of the "participants" in a secret government project. Immersed in the simulation you must get out of the town at the time of a zombie apocalypse, which is one of the ways to activate the alien gene sleeping inside you...

name: Train Your Minibot
description: Time to test your new robotics club project! Use household objects to build obstacle courses and then take control of a miniature robot to platform your way to the finishline!

name: Sword of the Necromancer: Ultra Collector's Edition
description:
Sword of the Necromancer is a dungeon-crawler action RPG with Rogue-like elements where you can revive your defeated enemies to make them fight alongside you.

Turn your foes into allies using the forbidden powers of the Sword of the Necromancer and help Tama reach the dungeon's depths in order to gain enough power to bring Koko back from the dead.

Gather a little army of monsters, equip yourself with weapons and relics and level up to take on the guardians that stand between you and your objective

The Ultra Collector's Edition includes:
- Sword of the Necromancer
- Certificate
- Artbook
- 7 IR Cards
- Instruction Booklet
- CD Original Soundtrack
- Ultra Collector's Edition Box

name: A Tale of Synapse: The Chaos Theories
description: A Tale of Synapse is a cross of platformer and puzzle game melting abstract art and sciences. Use the universe rules and all the element that compose it to help Synapsians to openminded. Discover an incredible and colorful story with Sci and Néro, two heroes, who cooperate to evolve in this oneiric world based on Math’s’ logics rules. The original soundtrack will immerse you in the universe of Hemeide. Are you able to enter this magical land? Play alone or co-op with your friend and develop your synapses to get more competencies, solve puzzles and fight enemies.

name: GreedFall: Gold Edition
description:
Greedfall: Gold Edition is the most complete way to experience the critically-acclaimed RPG, including the base game and the De Vespe conspiracy story expansion. Explore uncharted new lands as you set foot on a remote island seeping with magic, and filled with riches, lost secrets, and fantastic creatures. Forge this new world's destiny, as you befriend or betray companions and entire factions. With diplomacy, deception and force, become part of a living, evolving world - influence its course and shape your story.

Greedfall: Gold Edition includes; base game, The De Vespe conspiracy expansion, 3 lithographs, double-sided poster, and sticker sheet.

name: Abducted: The Night Hunters
description: Nobody know when it started, people began to disappear all arround the country, it escalated quickly to cases of mass disappearances around the entire world. Communications started to fail and so did our leaders, it was over before we knew it.

name: BricksVR
description: BricksVR is a multiplayer sandbox building game in VR. The only limit in BricksVR is your imagination!

name: Orb and the Stars
description: This stellar story will require reflexion and dexterity! In the spirit of vintage marble board games with puzzles and mazes, use gears and gizmos to lead an orb trough constellations and rekindle all the stars!

name: Super Glitter Rush
description: Super Glitter Rush is a boss-rush style bullet hell shoot-em-up!

name: Tilcolity Eyes
description: Sin descripción

name: Alien grenadier
description: You are stranded on a weird world with advanced grenades to defend yourself from the unknown. Destroy your enemies through procedurally generated levels of destructible environments, and discover the various ways to make explosions!

name: Super Smash Bros. Ultimate: Lloyd Outfit and Wig
description: Sin descripción

name: Contra Demake
description: A "One Level Concept" Demake of Contra for PICO-8!

name: Frog Jump
description: Doodle Jump clone

name: Disgaea 6: Defiance of Destiny - Raspberyl
description: Sin descripción

name: Disgaea 6: Defiance of Destiny - Mao
description: Sin descripción

name: I Wish it Was Morning All the Time
description: I Wish it Was Morning All the Time is a novel game released in 2021. It was first announced as a form that could be played with browser games and downloads. It was later ported to Steam.

name: Genderfelt
description: genderfelt is a short interactive zine, in which you read the blog of young person called Anon, going through the process of discovering himself. It focuses on the issue of transmedicalism, and how one can help to pull their peers away from a harmful ideology.

name: Chess Club
description: The greatest strategy game of all times! Select a stunning environment and challenge your friends, our AI, or one of the millions of Chess fans around the world.

name: Where are you, Cinderella?
description:
In a world where Vietnamese culture is honored, will you be able to find the owner of this shoe?

Where are you, Cinderella? is a visual novel that follows the adventure of two children: Tam and Alberto. Their dream is to become celebrities together, but fate has decided otherwise.

name: 13: Origin
description: The Room-like atmospheric puzzle game

name: Nanoscape
description: A first person exploration of a cancer cell deep in the human body, featuring a highly detailed simulation of cellular anatomy and processes based on the latest scientific research!

name: Predator: Hunting Grounds - Isabelle Fireteam DLC Pack
description: Play as the elite sniper Isabelle, featuring the look and voice of Alice Braga.

name: Butterflies Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Synchro Hedgehogs
description: The puzzle platform game with two funny twins moving as one!

name: Rebellion Gaia
description: If you're looking for the latest graphics and fast paced action you are in the wrong place! This game is a not for profit revenue raiser for activists, independent journalists and researchers all bringing light to our dark world. If you want to donate and support grass roots causes then enjoy!

name: Tiger Tank 59 I: Air Strike MP082
description: The classic tank battle game re-opens, guarding your base and defeating all enemy tanks. This DLC contains five new maps.

name: Tiger Tank 59 I: Air Strike MP055
description: The classic tank battle game re-opens, guarding your base and defeating all enemy tanks. This DLC contains five new maps.

name: Hunted: Kobayashi Tower
description: Work your way through the skyscraper to rescue your wife from terrorists in the digital adaptation of this solo card game. Manage the central row of cards, balancing when to hide and when to push your luck, collecting items and weapons, risking a fight, as you race against the clock.

name: TheHunter: Call of the Wild - Rancho del Arroyo
description: Hunt unique desert animals, explore a landscape full of secrets, and solve a century-old mystery that tore a powerful family apart in the latest reserve for the immersive hunting game theHunter: Call of the Wild.

name: Anime Cards
description: Welcome to the game "Anime cards"! A real puzzle in the style of "anime".

name: Dodge
description: Dodge is an arcade scoring game.

name: The Teleport
description: The Teleport is a horror game where we try to protect ourselves from creatures through cameras.

name: Walk of Shame
description: Escape without getting caught by your one-night stand's husband!! An indie pixel art game.

name: Operation: Pinkeye
description: Operation: Pinkeye is a throwback first-person shooter set in an alternate Universe where the Acts of Union in 1707 never happened. Scotland and England remain independent and tensions between the 2 remain very high.

name: A Wave of Enemies
description: A Wave of Enemies is an FPS game where the goal is to defend against hordes of monsters. There are 3 types of enemies in the game. With each wave, the speed and number of enemies increases. Use a machine gun to kill enemies. Break your previous record.

name: Dream's Reach: Village of the Gods
description: A 1-4 player Co-op Action-Adventure RPG with worlds inspired by ancient mythology. Explore a hand crafted overworld and procedurally generated dungeons or make your own to share with friends with our Puzzle/Dungeon Builder.

name: Parasomnia Verum
description: Parasomnia Verum is an atmospheric horror game about a recurring dream.

name: Star Pixie
description: It is a 2D spaceship war game. With our spaceship, we destroy enemies that come in waves.

name: Mariozza Cops
description: One year after the new world governments, 2:29. Unit 667 MARIOZZA is receiving a report of a suspicious flare in an industrial area. It turns out that there has been an explosion in one of the factories where the agents Jasper and TJ are carrying out unusual missions. While trying to reach out to the staff and explain the cause of the explosion, they encounter strong resistance from cyber machines that protect corporate secrets. What do you get: - ROE power to completely devastate your enemies - pimp your guns by boosting their performance - fight bosses that you haven't fought yet - game for 2 players - script with a dose of black humour - atmosphere of the game embedded in the graphic design of PIXEL ART

name: Merge & Blade
description:
Merge and Blade is a fantasy puzzle game.
You will engage in large-scale battles with monsters with your own squad which is made using merge mechanics.

After a battle, you can recruit new units using merge mechanics.
By proceeding with these puzzles and battles, you will retake the castles occupied by monsters.

name: Letters From a Rainy Day: Oceans and Lace
description: Luscious artwork brings the beautiful streets of Kamakura in June to life in this bittersweet sapphic story of a romance that begins with blackmail... This is a yuri adventure game based on the theme of love between girls at a lady's school in Kamakura, Japan.

name: Church of the Midnight Sailor
description: A 2D pixel art RPG that draws inspiration from Hyper Light Drifter, Commander Keen, and Disco Elysium.

name: Disgaea 6: Defiance of Destiny - Unrelenting Edition
description:
The first new DISGAEA game in six years is here! Meet Zed, a zombie that has risen above them all except one - a God of Destruction!

Can a mere Netherworld zombie rise up and destroy a god? Find out in the newest installment of the DISGAEA series! Features such as Super Reincarnation, 3D visuals (a first for this series), and adjustable gameplay settings make this the perfect game for both new and old DISGAEA fans!

Unrelenting Edition (NSW) includes:
- Disgaea 6: Defiance of Destiny for Nintendo Switch
- "Defiance of Dissonance" Soundtrack Digital Download
- "Behind the Seam" Mini Art Book
- Reversible Coversheet

name: Sea of Roses
description: Make choices and take control of Marion's destiny in this award-winning adventure game. Explore the peaceful and relaxing village of Seallea while making new friends and memories. Will you unravel the mysteries behind Marion's appearance in this magical new world?

name: Zombies Ate My Neighbors and Ghoul Patrol
description: The cult classic Zombies Ate My Neighbors and its sequel make their long awaited return in Zombies Ate My Neighbors and Ghoul Patrol! Play these classics from the golden age of 16-bit gaming with new enhancements and never before seen museum features.

name: Blasphemous: Deluxe Edition
description:
A foul curse has fallen upon the land of Cvstodia and all its inhabitants - it is simply known as The Miracle.

This Deluxe Edition includes:
Digital Comic: Take a journey back with us, to before the beginning of Blasphemous with the digital comic.
Blasphemous OST: Be transported to the land of Cvstodia and all it's different terrains with the Blasphemous original soundtrack."
Alloy of Sin' Skin: Slash any enemy that stands in your way with the 'Alloy of Sin' skin."
Digital Artbook: Dive deep into the making of Blasphemous with the Digital Artbook."

It’s down to you to free the world from this terrible fate and reach the origin of your anguish.

name: Fenrir's Prelude
description: You play as Fenrir, living on a floating island named Midrealm. You have friends who you care about, including your best friends: Amaterasu and Aphrodite. But you get the idea that something is off with someone on the island, especially once Aphrodite goes missing. It is up to you to figure out what is happening on Midrealm.

name: Arid
description: Arid is a gritty, exploration-survival experience that challenges players in surviving the most arid place in the world. By using your skills and adaptation, you must face the loneliness, the extreme temperatures, and mysteries of the Atacama Desert.

name: Odin: Valhalla Rising
description: ODIN: Valhalla Rising is an RPG game that will be launched for PC, Android and iOS. The game is based on Nordic mythology, developed by Lionheart Studio, which will be published by a South Korean company called Kakao Games. The ODIN: Valhalla Rising will be released in 2021.

name: Destroy All Humans!: DNA Collector's Edition
description:
The cult-classic returns! Terrorize the people of 1950s Earth in the role of the evil alien Crypto-137. Harvest DNA and bring down the US government in the remake of the legendary alien invasion action-adventure. Annihilate puny humans using an assortment of alien weaponry and psychic abilities. Reduce their cities to rubble with your Flying Saucer! One giant step on mankind!

The DNA Collector's Edition includes:
- Premium Box
- Game: Destroy All Humans!
- Crypto’N’Cow figurine 23cm x 9cm
- Key Chain
- 6 Lithographs
- Eye-popping anti-stress toy
- Included All In-Game Crypto Skins

name: Super Smash Bros. Ultimate: Challenger Pack 10
description:
From the Tekken series, Kazuya Mishima brings his demonic DNA into the fray as a DLC fighter in the Super Smash Bros. Ultimate game. Kazuya’s fighting style captures the distinct style of the Tekken series as he gets up close and personal with heavy strikes and incredible comeback power. His specials tap into his Devil Gene with moves like the beam-shooting Devil Blaster and high-flying Devil Wings. The son of Tekken icon Heihachi Mishima, Kazuya has a chip on his shoulder and destructive power.

What makes Kazuya Mishima unique in this game are his standard attacks—rather than 4 directional standard attacks, he has 8. This addition of diagonal inputs mimics his abilities in the Tekken games and make him an unpredictable fighter with a lot of combo options. The stage added with this fighter is the Mishima Dojo, which starts out with all four directions closed off. A strong launch or direct attack can shatter the walls and ceilings, allowing for opponents to get KO’d.

name: Ruins of Sathryn
description: This is a fairly open map with a desert and ruins theme, offering plenty of chaotic combat and a fairly simple progression.

name: Where the Demon Lurks
description: Where the Demon Lurks is a mostly kinetic SFW visual novel with a few branching parts, and some occasional fan service.

name: Aria at the Funeraria
description: See ghosts and corpse brides at the funeral home.

name: Heart a La Mode
description: Join our protagonist on her riveting journey of money wasting, emotional turmoil and awkward romance!

name: Last Resort
description: Last Resort is a small co-op shooter in which you and up to 3 others defend humanity's first hotel on Mars against hostile aliens. Defend & power up generators, upgrade your weapons and gun down hordes of aliens to save the hotel!

name: Gravitaze: Two
description: Gravitaze: Two is a minimalist puzzle whose objective is to make the circle reach the center of the labyrinth, changing the gravity of the circle and rotating the labyrinth.

name: Violent Witches: the Vindicator
description: Sorrowful Witch Killing RPG

name: Spirit Bounce
description: The world was corrupted after a spirit of darkness was born, now Aqua, Ignis and Spark must come together to save their friends and restore the world's balance. Relive the essence of classic brick-breaking arcades in a fun adventure with charismatic characters.

name: Mighty Chameleon Brothers
description: Mighty Chameleon Brothers will remind you of old-school arcade classics, with bright and colorful visuals and fun cartoon characters! You'll love the simple yet addictive game play!

name: Castle Champion
description: Fight the bosses and save the king. In this top down shooter your goal is to go through each of the three bosses and save the king! With 3 health and bosses that you can't touch, have fun trying to get through this challenging top down shooter!

name: 12 Labours of Hercules XII: Timeless Adventure
description: Help Hercules repair the clock he broke trying to turn back time, defeat Chronos and save the world from catastrophe!

name: Cheap Game 3
description: Cheap game 3 is simple roguelite where minigames plays the main role

name: Football Bus Battle 2021
description: Oh no…The rival team has stolen the Football Cup before the tournament even started! The teams have deprived you of the big win. It's up to you give chase, hunt down the thieves and claim victory for your nation! Score enough Soccer team busses to become the 2021 Football Bus Battle Champion!

name: Ancient Life
description: Ancient Life is a game that simulates the life of ancient people. The game contains various events that may have occurred in ancient times. Players can choose to farm, be an official, craftsman, be a hunter, be a merchant, and have different occupations.

name: Visitors: First Contact
description: A retro Sci-Fi First Person/Third Person shooter game that focuses on the battle between the 21st century humans and the first ever alien race visiting Earth. The player will battle the alien race and their monster creations over the course of several missions in a single-player campaign mode.

name: Head 2 Head
description: Head 2 Head is a single player fighting game experience. You fight through a gauntlet of enemies, using ALL HEAD JUTSU to prove that you are the best. Collect Skulls and Roguelike stat buffs each time you defeat an enemy to get further along the road to becoming the HEAD MASTER.

name: Curved Space
description: Curved Space is an intense arcade shooter about battling cosmic energy spiders across warped, physics-defying battlefields. Space stations and asteroids curve and loop around themselves. Up? Down? Who needs those when you’ve got a spaceship, guns and swarms of bugs to blast?

name: The Final Stand: Breakout
description:
The Final Stand:Breakout is a multiplayer wave based survival game, play as Light Containment Task Force agents during multiple outbreaks of RA-005.
Survive endless waves up to 10 players, of infected populous (RA-005-B), earning money from killing or damaging RA-005-B and completing certain tasks. Money can be used to purchase weapons, open doors, and activate traps. RA-005-B become stronger, faster and appear higher numbers in every following wave.

name: Onirike
description: Onirike is an original adventure, puzzles, and 3d platformer video game that plays in an intricate open world, designed with a non-linear narrative, and presented with a peculiar graphics and sound aesthetic.

name: Baby's First Crudelo Sphere
description: Sin descripción

name: Another Attack 2: Weissensee
description: A sequel to Another Attack, continuing straight from where Woudrichem left off. While the previous map was based on a real-life town in the Netherlands, Weissensee is based on a lake and its surroundings in Austria.

name: Bat Enchanter Witch
description: Take control of the witch Evelyn and escape the evil queen's castle by running, jumping and using magic to turn the bats into helpful allies.

name: Button Lock 2: Star Carrier
description: Can you solve the puzzle with the limited amount of moves? Explore the world map. Solve the levels with different gimmicks. Get stars by beating levels to explore more of the world map. Solve over 170 levels in this puzzle adventure game.

name: Space: Breakthrough Gaming Arcade
description: Sin descripción

name: Claw Stars
description: Thousands of Hamsters were sent into space for survivability experiments - but due to an accident, they warped through a temporal wormhole. Millions of years went by in a matter of minutes and the hamsters evolved with super intellect, tumbling out into the same yet unfamiliar universe transformed by time!

name: Brave Cano
description: A tale of a pretentious boy, growing up to become a true hero. A simple single-player action RPG that has everything you want. The countless cut-scenes make the game feel like an animated movie. Enjoy the story that unfolds as you progress through the stages! Most stages require decent dexterity, but you will face riddling stages along the way as well. But don’t worry, we believe you are more than capable of pushing through. Summon Roots to bind enemies who are running away. And when you encounter Shielded Enemies, try using poison! Find the optimal strategy for each stage. There’s an answer to every stage.

name: Somnography
description: An entry for dream diary jam 5, created by a team of four over the span of about one month.

name: Flesh of the Killer
description: In a dark freeport on the edge of the city the artworks are stored; it's a members-only institution and a secret to everybody. That's why BB and her friends want to document as much as possible before they get kicked out. But why does the vault have no security guards? Just what has been evolving underground in the forbidden Museum Of Moral Art? And if inanimate objects could have morals, would we understand them?

name: Terra Firma
description: Play god and create your own world in this complex simulation. Plate tectonics, wind and water erosion and plant life all develop and interact to produce a world that is viewable from a single tree to kilometres across.

name: Mini Ship Wars
description: Infiltrate the lair enemy, full of traps, labyrinths and warships. You are faced with a difficult task - to get to the very end of the huge sea and defeat every enemy on your way, sailing 18 various locations-labyrinths, solving puzzles and engaging in dangerous battles.

name: Exvelten
description: Exvelten is a Free to play Tutorial of RPG Maker XP + first game of the Gzhapel Series. You are Cytheria or Zachiev; a lone traveler in a home tent. Explore four quadrants of different seasons. Spring Rain, Snow, Desert. Finally a Town to have a little Fun in! Exvelten is a sandbox learning game!

name: Last Mortem
description: Multiplayer FPS Game in the style of old-school browser shooters set up in the fictional Cold War battlefields! The game feature fast-paced FPS gameplay with online players or AI BOTs, a huge variety of weapons, unique maps, the progression system, and many more features!

name: Maze Masters
description: Try to find your way out of the maze while fighting your way through the monsters in the maze with your AK-47 Rifle as well as trying to find the hidden objectives scattered on each map. You can choose to escape the maze or just fight your way through the monsters in the survival mode.

name: Biscuitts 4
description: Biscuitts 04 is a Beat Em Up Game based on the 80s Cartoon.

name: RhythMario 64.5: Crescendo of Cosmic Beast
description: Sin descripción

name: Fire Emblem: Host of the Dark
description: Fire emblem 8 rom hack

name: Kifo Quest
description: Sin descripción

name: Daughter
description:
Daughter is a traditional Yume Nikki fangame starring Edel, an old lady who lives alone and refuses to enter the rooms of her home besides her own. You may explore her dreams while she waits for her family to visit her.

As you explore her dreams, you can collect Edel's power fantasies (effects) which are "better" versions of her that will help you go deeper, and the deeper you go eventually you'll be able to open the doors and find what is Edel hiding.

name: Viscous Realms
description: Viscous Realms is a large Boom-format hell map that is themed around three of OTEX's liquids: blood, goop, and lava.

name: Chao Bandstand
description: Something has stolen the chao's precious instruments for their little bandstand. Who could've done such a thing!? It's up to a small little rabbit to go and find them. Six music boxes to find, find the thief and make the poor little chao happy once again!

name: The Caverns
description:
An employee at the roadside tourist attraction “The Caverns” falls asleep after closing down the gift shop. Explore their dreams and find the six gifts in order to wake up again.

The game was developed for Dream Diary Jam 5 and is the first entry in a series called The Night Shift Anthology.

name: Yuki Nime
description: A Yume Nikki fangame created for Dream Diary Jam 5. Explore a dreamlike and restless world, discoverer all its secrets...

name: Sweet Sleep
description:
With unending amounts of free time, Madotsuki finds herself with a lack of things to do. More often than not, she sleeps. While her dreams were surreal before, they were at least consistent. When her dreams begin to change she finds new turmoil in herself.

Sweet Sleep is a visual novel with branching paths. Features original artwork and music based on the original RPG Maker walking sim.

name: Nightmares and Other True Stories
description: Nightmares and Other True Stories is a traditional Yume Nikki fangame, the goal being to explore and interact with the world. A game made for the Dream Diary Jam 5.

name: Immersit
description: A YNFG Fangame made initially for Dream Diary Jam 5. You play as Josephine, who has been locked in her bedroom.

name: Dawn of Dreams
description: Dawn of Dreams is a 3D fangame of the classic indie hit, Yume Nikki. A woman by the name of Doakeru is our protagonist, a lone being living in the middle of a desert. Nevertheless, she manages to reach other people through her dreams, exploring theirs instead.

name: Alien Dead
description:
Alien Dead is a game about escaping your dreams and awakening to an unknown overworld.
It seems you must reach the deepest part of your dreams first.

But how deep of a sleep do you have to be in?

name: Growth
description: Growth is a 2.5D Yume Nikki fangame. You explore the protagonist's dream world.

name: Half-Life: Uplinked
description: Uplinked is a series of eleven maps that aims to be an extension to “Forget About Freeman!”. You now have to tune the transmitter to gain access to the Lambda Complex. It contains several new puzzles along the way.

name: Hungry Pigs
description: Become a pig and eat all the cabbage you can!

name: Iso
description: Iso is a traditional Yume Nikki fangame for Dream Diary Jam 5. It stars a young man named Cygnus. He can only dream or take a shower. His appearance becomes elf-like when dreaming.

name: Dream Doll Dimension
description: Dream Doll Dimension is an English Yume Nikki fangame created for Dream Diary Jam 5. You explore a strange dimension, the goal of the game being to solve the puzzles in each room.

name: Bokehme
description: Bokehme is an English Yume Nikki fangame made for the Dream Diary Jam 5. The game starts with Bokehme in her bedroom, who refuses to leave. The game tells you to collect dolls scattered around the dream world.

name: If Nil then
description:
if Nil then is an English Yume Nikki fangame created for Dream Diary Jam 5.
You begin the game as a spirit named Nil, stuck in a blood covered room with a disembodied head. Interacting with the head will allow to take control of Nozomi.

name: Soul Labyrinth
description: Psychological Fantasy VN/Adventure: Explore the complexities of the heart and mind.

name: Lovely Sweet Dream
description:
Welcome to Lovely Sweet Dream! A game made for the Yume Nikki Dream Diary Jam 5! Inspired by Yume Nikki and LSD Dream Emulator.

A girl called Lulu is walking home from school one day when she finds an interesting looking charm at a flea market. The box describes that the charm will give the user wonderful dreams. Intrigued, Lulu takes the charm home and it introduces itself as LOVELY. With LOVELY's power, Lulu can explore its beautiful and happy dreams.

name: Craftsman
description: Craftsman is a game about a cubic world in which you can build anything you want. Explore the location, get resources and indulge in creativity!

name: Mecha Tactics
description: Build mechas, command your squad members to victory and conquest, seize the stars, settle randomized unknown star systems, defend your faction from hordes of assailants. Featuring: -Randomized enemy squads. -Randomized star systems. -Grid based Combat. -Local 2-Players versus mode.

name: Mystic Isles
description: Mystic Isles is an online multiplayer strategy board game with 2-6 friends.

name: Rally Racer: Offroad Racing Car Game
description: Rally Racer is a thrilling racer game giving you plenty of challenges and situations to test you skills at.

name: Separation Anxiety
description:
An entry for Dream Diary Jam 5.

Meiko's a girl with a rough home life and a rougher social life. One day after school, a mysterious hole appears in her bedroom wall. Inside is a world of her own subconscious.

Collect the 6 effects and explore the psyche of a troubled young girl.

name: Bocce
description: Bocce is a video game based on the Italian sport of the same name.

name: Space Explore VR
description: Sin descripción

developers.name: Yash Future Tech Solutions Pvt Ltd

name: Silent Scale
description: Silent Scale is a music themed rom hack for Super Mario 64. It was made for the SimpleFlips Music Themed Level Competition, where it ranked 28th place.

name: RDP-Files_
description: Sin descripción

name: Natural Pressures
description: After a camping trip goes wrong, a terrific storm leaves you trapped in the forest! With minimal resources and a maze-like woodland to escape, you'd do anything to survive...even sacrifice your humanity! Will you keep grinding and fighting for a route home, or submit to the natural pressures and adapt to your new life?

name: Meteor World Actor: Badge & Dagger
description: Superpowered detective noir. Maverick detective Ruka Hiryu pursues criminals by day⁠—and ices perps by night...

name: Guitar Hero 64
description: Ever wanted to play Guitar Hero in a Super Mario 64 hack? Probably not, but here it is anyway.

name: Naruto to Boruto: Shinobi Striker - Master Character Training Pack: Sakura Haruno
description:
A special training pack for your avatar!

Featured in this "Master Character Training Pack" is the one-and-only Sakura Haruno (Great Ninja War)!
Purchasing this DLC will make her available as a master at the Ninjutsu Library, ready to offer Ninjutsu training.

Train with Sakura Haruno (Great Ninja War) to acquire Training Points that can be used to unlock a variety of Ninjutsu and costumes for your avatar!

name: Twistetchi
description: The Twistetchi is a licensed Tamagotchi Nano model based on Twisted Wonderland, a Japanese battle/rhythm mobile game co-developed by The Walt Disney Company and Aniplex, that prominently features several antagonists from the former's animated films.

name: Traumruf
description:
Traumruf is a Yume Nikki fangame created for Dream Diary Jam 5.

Traumruf plays like a traditional fangame, focusing on exploration. Unlike most fangames, the player character starts out asleep. Exiting the bedroom will take the player into the dream world. Interacting with the closet changes the main character's appearance.

name: Hermeticism
description: Created for Dream Diary Jam 5. This is Yume Nikki inspired game with alchemical themes. You play as Mori, an alchemist who needs to collect ingredients in order to carry out a ritual.

name: Kooky Sphere
description: Kooky Sphere is a game made for the Dream Diary Jam 5 you explore the dreams of Rose.

name: Utakata no R: Kako-hen Awayuki
description: "Utakata no R: Kakohen Awayuki" is a role-playing game created by "R Man 44", released in 2021.

name: Dimensional: Prophecy of Zohar
description:
Dimensional Prophecy of Zohar is a Philosophical Visual Novel game based on a Novel and Independent Movie Project by Michael Kumpmann. The Gameplay is largely kinetic and uses a lot of video sequences.

Future humanity is in conflict with a mysterious, incomprehensible alien species which is defined as terrorists by the government. A group of mathematicians developed an algorithm which can predict the behavior of the attackers. A young lonely girl should become a new member of the institute but when she arrives at Kyoto Novalis, the aliens attack and she gets lost in the city. Hilal, her new guardian, a female cyborg, searches her in the city, but they don't have much time, because the government ordered a nuclear attack on the city if the aliens can't be stopped in time.

name: Sonic Classic 2
description:
Sonic Classic 2 is a 2D fangame that is a sequel to Sonic Classic by Hez which will include:

Brand New Levels
4 playable characters (Sonic, Tails, Knuckles, and Fang)
New unique gimmicks
Customizable shields
SC1 revamped levels
Online Play
Extras & More!

name: Wasteland Punk: Post Apocalypse RPG Survival Game
description: Sin descripción

name: Hidden Expedition: A King's Line - Collector's Edition
description: King Arthur’s Legend Comes Alive!

name: Super Mario World Widescreen
description: Super Mario World Widescreen is an Improvement ROM hack/mod for Super Mario World (SNES) to use together with a specific emulator (bsnes-hd-beta) which makes Super Mario World work in widescreen, adapting the whole game engine to be able to work with widescreen and ultra-widescreen resolutions.

name: Scarlet Nexus: Deluxe Edition
description:
The Deluxe Edition includes:
• Scarlet Nexus (full game)
• Brain Punk Bundle

Deluxe Edition Bonuses:
• Additional Attachment "The Other"
• SAS Plug-in Variations (3)

Choose between Yuito and Kasane, elite psionics each armed with a talent in psychokinesis and their own reason to fight. Complete both of their stories to unlock all the mysteries of a Brain Punk future caught between technology and psychic abilities.

name: Super Squad: Super Pack
description: The Super Squad Super Pack unlocks all Troopers currently in game and all Troopers ever released.

name: Code Correction
description: A puzzle game based on parity and hamming codes.

name: Babol the Walking Box
description: Begin your adventure with your new friends! Explore the amazing world of box, from the wilderness, desert, to super duper cold snowy mountains!

name: Seek Wife
description: Seek Wife is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls.The game is perfect for relaxing.

name: Candy land
description: In front of you are cards with different "delicious" images. The images are hidden from you. You need to find all pairs of identical images. You can open two cards at the same time. Remember the pictures, look for their pairs, and try to use as few attempts as possible.

name: Fantastic Honey
description: Fantastic Honey - A hentai puzzle game in which you have to piece together images of elves, who are striving to take off some of their clothes! A lot of beautiful pictures await you, in which every player will definitely find what he likes!

name: To Kill A King
description: An old school style classic JRPG with a foul mouth, foul-tempered undead warrior hell bent on revenge against the Ignoble King. Over 30 hours of gameplay!

name: Fire and Dungeon
description: Fire and Dungeon - turn-based dungeon exploration game with RPG elements.

name: Recall
description: Recall is a melee-combat based, rich-story third-person game. You can neutralize your enemies with various methods using punches, knives and different weapons, and you can also find yourself lost in the streets of the city ...

name: Coalhero
description: 故事是從這裡開始的—某天主角因公司倒閉而失業，那樣的年代失業可不是小事，要是無法賺錢養家餬口，他們一家三口可不是要露宿街頭？這種時候不論做什麼工作他都願意！此時天外飛來的傳單，像是天降奇蹟般地拯救了他。於是他下定決心，去薪水高但充滿危險與怪物的礦坑工作。礦工作為礦坑中的勇者，雖然有著極高的薪水，但他們要剷除礦坑中的各種怪物，化解所有危機，能夠從危機重重的礦坑中，將煤礦帶回礦坑外的礦工，被人們譽為「黑金勇者」。

name: 汉室雄风
description: Sin descripción

name: Valakas: Immortal
description: VALAKAS: Immortal - An action shooter from the third person in the image of the greatest streamer Valakas. Mercilessly destroy the mighty empire of Detrov.

name: Zombie Apocalypse 2021
description: Zombie Apocalypse 2021 is a fast old-school shooting game in platformer style. Kill all zombies and protect your city in this super fast game!

name: Baseball Adventure
description: Baseball Adventure is a 2d game designed for the speed and reaction of the player, each blow must be calculated and hit in time, watch the moving objects around and have time to pull out the glove to catch the ball.

name: Pocket Races
description: Pocket Races allows you to create a minicar race and test your racing skills at your own pace. This is a game where you can easily use your design skills to fully push your racing approach to the next level in a powerful and engaging manner. We are here to offer you access to some of the nicest and most immersive game worlds where you can create cool and fun races. Since Pocket Races has multiple environments to choose from like the kitchen, board games, sand pit or bathroom, you can easily use your imagination and create cool races. Then you can start and test your racing skills against your own time or other players. Check it out today if you want a unique way to create your own races and have fun testing them!
